card.Name: Merlwyb
card.Text: EX BURST: When Merlwyb enters the field, draw 2 cards then discard 1 card from your hand.

card.Name: Yuna
card.Text: When Yuna attacks, all Characters other than Light and Dark opponent controls lose all their abilities until the end of the turn. Spherechange [S]: Name 1 Element and 1 Job. Yuna becomes the named Element and Job until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Larsa
card.Text: The Forwards you control don't receive damage that is less than their power. [1 Water CP, dull]: Choose 1 blocking Forward. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Leviathan
card.Text: EX BURST: All Water Forwards gain +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Refia
card.Text: The cost required to play your [Job (Standard Unit)] Forwards onto the field is reduced by 1 (it cannot become 0).

card.Name: Lenne
card.Text: When Lenne forms a party with [Card Name (Yuna)] and attacks, you may search for 1 Summon and cast it without paying the cost. If you do not cast it, put the Summon into the Break Zone. If you cast a Summon of cost 5 or more with this ability, put Lenne into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Rosa
card.Text: Whenever a Forward you control is chosen by your opponent's Summon, you may draw 1 card. Protect [S]: All the Forwards you control don't receive damage that is less than their power this turn.

card.Name: Rosa
card.Text: The [Card Name (Cecil)] you control gains +1000 power. [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Reduce the next damage dealt to it this turn by 1000.

card.Name: Warrior of Light
card.Text: Reduce the damage dealt to the [Job (Warrior of Light)] you control by 2000. Bitter End [S] [1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it damage equal to Warrior of Light's power.

card.Name: Fusoya
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage. Fusoya deals you 1 point of damage.

card.Name: The Emperor
card.Text: The Characters opponent controls cannot use special or action abilities.

card.Name: Zemus
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. It cannot be blocked this turn.

card.Name: Red Mage
card.Text: When Red Mage enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If you control 4 or more [Card Name (Red Mage)], deal it 8000 damage.

card.Name: Ifrit

card.Name: Ace

For each [Job (Class Zero Cadet)] revealed this way, deal it 4000 damage. Then, place the revealed cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.Name: Garland
card.Text: During your turn, if Garland receives damage, reduce the damage by 2000 instead. Soul of Chaos [S] [X CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 6000 damage and 1000 more damage for each CP paid as X.

card.Name: Bard

card.Name: Cloud

card.Name: Cater

card.Name: Gladiator

card.Name: Amarant

card.Name: Ramza
card.Text: For each [Category (FFT)] Forward you control other than Ramza, Ramza gains +1000 power. [3 CP]: Choose 1 [Category (FFT)] Forward you control. It gains +1000 power, Haste, and First Strike until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Dragoon
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP]: Dragoon gains Haste until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Artemicion

card.Name: Famfrit, the Darkening Cloud

card.Name: Izayoi

card.Name: Ephemeral Summoner

card.Name: Eiko

card.Name: Eiko

card.Name: Dancer

card.Name: Garnet
card.Text: Garnet cannot be chosen by your opponent's Summons. When you cast a Summon, all the Forwards you control gain +1000 power until the end of the turn. [2 Water]: Cast 1 Summon of cost 3 or less from your hand without paying its cost.

card.Name: Cagnazzo
card.Text: If Cagnazzo receives damage during your opponent's turn, reduce the damage by 4000 instead. When Cagnazzo enters the field, until the end of the turn, all the Forwards opponent controls lose 1000 power for every 2 Water Characters you control.

card.Name: Ghido
card.Text: Ghido does not activate during the Active Phase. [1 Water CP]: Activate Ghido. [1 Water CP, 1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward of cost 5 or more opponent controls. Put it on top of its owner's deck.

card.Name: Summoner

card.Name: Syldra
card.Text: Choose up to 2 Forwards opponent controls. Return them to their owners' hand.

card.Name: White Mage

card.Name: Knight

card.Name: Porom

card.Text: If your opponent doesn't control Forwards, put Famed Mimic Gogo into the Break Zone. Power Hit [S]: Choose 1 Forward. Put it into the Break Zone. You can only use this ability if Famed Mimic Gogo has received damage this turn.

card.Name: Trion
card.Text: The [Job (Knight)] other than Trion you control gain +1000 power.

card.Name: Naghi
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward blocking a [Job (Class Zero Cadet)]. It loses 1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Ravager
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP, dull]: Choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 4000 damage.

card.Name: Cannoneer
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP, dull, put Cannoneer into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 blocking Forward. It loses 3000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Dark Knight
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP]: Deal 1000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls and 2000 damage to Dark Knight.

card.Name: Lightning
card.Text: Haste At the end of the turn, return Lightning to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Ramuh
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 damaged Forward. Deal it 7000 damage.

card.Name: Ramza
card.Text: The cost required to play Ramza onto the field is reduced by 1 for each Forward you control (it cannot become 0). For each Forward other than Ramza you control, Ramza gains +1000 power. If Ramza has 10000 power or more, Ramza gains Haste and 'When Ramza attacks, choose 1 Forward of cost 3 or less opponent controls. Break it.'

card.Name: Dragoon
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP]: Dragoon gains First Strike until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Louisoix
card.Text: When Louisoix enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Alisaie)] or [Card Name (Alphinaud)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Andoria
card.Text: When a party you control deals damage to your opponent, draw 1 card.

card.Name: Vossler
card.Text: If you control [Card Name (Ashe)], the cost for playing Vossler onto the field is reduced by 2. If Vossler receives damage, reduce the damage by 1000 instead. If the [Card Name (Ashe)] you control receives damage, reduce the damage by 2000 instead.

card.Name: Aria (III)
card.Text: EX Burst: When Aria (III) enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Warrior of Light)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Ozma
card.Text: [0 CP]: Until the end of the turn, Ozma also becomes a Forward with 8000 power and 'Ozma doesn't receive damage from Dark cards.' You can only use this ability once per turn. Flare Star [S] [2 Water CP, 2 CP, dull]: All the Forwards opponent controls lose 2000 power for each CP required to play them until the end of the turn. You can only use this ability is Ozma is a Forward.

card.Name: Ondore
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Category (XII)] Forward you control. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Cloud of Darkness
card.Text: When Cloud of Darkness enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. It loses 2000 power for each Forward you control until the end of the turn. When Cloud of Darkness attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. It loses 1000 power for each Forward you control until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Curilla
card.Text: When Curilla enters the field or attacks, choose 1 Water Forward you control. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. Savage Blade [S] [1 Water CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage. If you control [Card Name (Trion)], deal it 9000 damage instead.

card.Name: Claidie
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Job (Prince)] Forward or [Job (Knight)] Forward. Activate it.

card.Name: Schrodinger
card.Text: When Schrodinger enters the field, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Forward, draw 1 card. If it is a Backup, select 1 Character in your Break Zone and add it to your hand. If it is a Monster, your opponent selects 1 Forward he/she controls and return it to its owner's hand. If it is a Summon, draw 2 cards.

card.Name: Tonberry
card.Text: When a Character opponent controls searches for 1 or more cards, put Tonberry into the Break Zone. If you do so, break that Character.

card.Name: Arcanist
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Water Forward. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn. [2 Water CP, 1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. It loses 3000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Baderon
card.Text: When Baderon enters the field, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 card among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.Name: Bismarck
card.Text: Select 1 of the following 3 actions: 'Choose 1 Monster. Return it to its owner's hand.' 'Choose 1 Character you control. Return it to its owner's hand.' 'Choose 1 Forward. Halve its power until the end of the turn (round down to the nearest 1000).'

card.Name: Celestia
card.Text: When a party you control attacks, all Forwards in that party gain +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Porom
card.Text: EX Burst: When Porom enters the field, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order. [1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 action ability. Cancel its effect.

card.Name: Flintlock
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. It doesn't receive damage that is less than its power this turn.

card.Name: Green Mage
card.Text: [Dull, put Green Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 action ability. Cancel its effect.

card.Name: Moogle Knight
card.Text: [1 Water CP]: Moogle Knight doesn't receive any damage from your opponent's Summons or abilities this turn.

card.Name: Leviathan
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward. If its cost is equal to or less than the number of cards in your hand, return it to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Fisher
card.Text: [2 Water CP, 1 CP, dull, put Fisher into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Monster of cost 3 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field. You can only use this ability during your turn.

card.Name: Refia
card.Text: The [Job (Warrior or Light)] Forwards and Water Forwards other than Refia you control gain +1000 power. [Dull a total of 5 active Water Forwards or Water Backups]: Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Return it to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Rosa
card.Text: EX Burst: When Rosa enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Cecil)] and add it to your hand. [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. During this turn, the next damage dealt to it is reduced by 1000 instead. If the Forward is [Card Name (Cecil)], during this turn, the next damage dealt to it is reduced by 3000 instead.

card.Name: Orator
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Select a Job. It gains that Job until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Orator
card.Text: [Dull, put Orator into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Monster you control. Return it to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Vaan
card.Text: When Vann attacks, select up to 2 of the following 5 actions. 'Draw 1 card.' 'Choose 1 Backup. Activate it.' 'Choose 1 Forward. Dull it.' 'Choose 1 Forward. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn.' 'Choose 1 Forward. It cannot block this turn.'

card.Name: Wol
card.Text: When Wol enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 [Job (Warrior of Light)] among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order. When Wol is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 [Job (Warrior or Light)] of cost 3 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field.

card.Name: Eald'narche
card.Text: If Eald'narche leaves the field, return Eald'narche to your hand instead. Paradise [S]: Take 1 more turn after this one. At the end of that turn, you lose the game.

card.Name: Kam'lanaut
card.Text: When Kam'lanaut enters the field, you may search for 1 Dark card and add it to your hand. Kam'lanaut cannot be chosen by Summons or abilities that share its Element. At the beginning of your Main Phase 1, select 1 Element. Kam'lanaut becomes that Element (this effect does not end at the end of the turn).

card.Name: Amodar
card.Text: If your opponent controls any Monster, Amodar gains +2000 power, First Strike and Brave. When a Forward you control is put from the field into the Break Zone, double the power of Amodar until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Noel
card.Text: If you control [Card Name (Serah)], Noel gains +2000 power. [2 Fire CP, 4 CP]: Play Noel onto the field. You can only use this ability during your Main Phase and if Noel is in the Break Zone.

card.Name: Lebreau
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Category (XIII)] Forward you control. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Serah
card.Text: EX Burst: When Serah enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Moogle)] and add it to your hand. When Serah attacks, activate all the [Job (Moogle)] you control. [Discard 1 [Job (Moogle)]]: Choose 1 Forward. Dull it.

card.Name: Mog (XIII-2)
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Card Name (Serah)] or [Card Name (Noel)]. It gains First Strike or Brave until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Yeul
card.Text: [0 CP]: Look at the top card of your deck. You can only use this ability once per turn. When Yeul is put from the field into the Break Zone, put the top 10 cards of your deck into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Vaan
card.Text: When Vaan enters the field, activate all the [Job (Sky Pirate)] you control. Pyroclasm [S] [1 Wind CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage for each Backup you control.

card.Name: Balthier
card.Text: When Balthier enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 [Job (Sky Pirate)] among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.Name: Fran
card.Text: For each [Job (Sky Pirate)] other than Fran you control, Fran gains +1000 power. The [Card Name (Balthier)] you control cannot be chosen by your opponent's Summons.

card.Name: Yda
card.Text: For each [Job (Scion of the Seventh Dawn)] other than Yda you control, Yda gains +2000 power. When Yda attacks, choose 1 dull Forward opponent controls. Deal it damage equal to half of Yda's power (round down to the nearest 1000).

card.Name: Papalymo
card.Text: EX Burst: When Papalymo enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Yda)] and add it to your hand. If the [Card Name (Yda)] you control deals damage to a Forward, increase the damage by 2000 instead.

card.Name: Minfilia
card.Text: EX Burst: When Minfilia enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Scion of the Seventh Dawn)] Forward and add it to your hand. [1 Earth CP, dull, put Minfilia into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it. You may only use this ability if you control 5 or more [Job (Scion of the Seventh Dawn)].

card.Name: Alisaie
card.Text: If you control [Card Name (Alphinaud)], the cost for playing Alisaie onto the field is reduced by 1. The [Job (Scion of the Seventh Dawn)] Forwards you control gain Haste.

card.Name: Alphinaud
card.Text: [1 Lightning, dull]: Choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 1000 damage. If you control a [Job (Scion of the Seventh Dawn)] Forward, deal it 2000 damage instead.

card.Name: Urianger
card.Text: When Urianger enters the field, choose 1 Monster in your Break Zone. If its cost is equal to or less than the number of [Job (Scion of the Seventh Dawn)] Forwards you control, play it onto the field.

card.Name: Ashe
card.Text: When Ashe enters the field, if you control a [Job (Sky Pirate)], draw 1 card. [Dull]: Choose 1 [Job (Sky Pirate)]. Activate it.

card.Name: Larsa
card.Text: When Larsa enters the field, draw 2 cards. When Larsa is put from the field into the Break Zone, draw 1 card.

card.Name: Rasler
card.Text: The [Card Name (Ashe)] you control cannot be broken by opposing Summons or abilities that don't deal damage.

card.Name: Ward
card.Text: The [Job (Warrior)] Forwards other than Ward you control gain +2000 power.

card.Name: Garland
card.Text: If you control a [Job (Princess)], the [Job (Knight)] Forwards you control gain Brave. Blaze [S] (1 Fire CP): Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage. Round Edge [S] (2 Fire CP, 1 CP]: Choose 1 Forward. Break it. Deal 5000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Guy
card.Text: Brave For each [Category (II)] Character other than Guy you control, Guy gains +1000 power. When Guy is put from the field into the Break Zone, activate all the Forwards you control.

card.Name: Kiros
card.Text: When Kiros enters the field, choose 1 Forward you control other than Kiros. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. If it is a [Category (VIII)] Forward, it also gains Haste, First Strike and Brave until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Illusionist
card.Text: [Dull, put Illusionist into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. It must attack this turn if possible.

card.Name: Cornelia
card.Text: When Cornelia enters the field, all the Forwards you control gain 1000 power until the end of the turn. [1 Fire CP, dull]: Return Cornelia to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Goblin
card.Text: [0 CP]: Until the end of the turn, Goblin also becomes a Forward with 5000 power and 'When Goblin Attacks, choose 1 Forward. Deal it 1000 damage.' You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Cid (XI)
card.Text: When Cid (XI) enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following abilities: 'Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card among them to your hand and put the rest of the cards into the Break Zone.' 'All the Forwards you control gain +3000 power until the end of the turn.'

card.Name: Vermilion Bird l'Cie Caetuna
card.Text: If a Forward is dealt damage by your Fire Summon, the damage increases by 1000 instead. When Vermillion Bird l'Cie Caetuna enters the field, you may search for 1 Fire Summon of cost 4 or less and cast it without paying the cost. If you do not cast it, put the Summon into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Dominion Legionary
card.Text: When Dominion Legionary enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Dominion Legionary)] and add it to your hand. [Dull, put Dominion Legionary into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 attacking Forward. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Zell
card.Text: Haste When Zell enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions. 'Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it damage equal to Zell's power.' 'Choose 1 Monster of cost 2 or less opponent controls. Break it.'

card.Name: Selphie
card.Text: EX BURST: When Selphie enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (SeeD Candidate)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Warrior
card.Text: When Warrior attacks, Warrior gains +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Soldier
card.Text: [2 CP]: Warrior gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Dark Lord
card.Text: When Dark Lord enters the field, remove the top 10 cards of your deck from the game. At the beginning of your Attack Phase, choose up to 1 Forward. Deal it 3000 damage.

card.Name: Bahamut
card.Text: EX BURST: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 10000 damage. Bahamut deals you 1 point of damage. EX Bursts of cards put into the Damage Zone due to this ability cannot be used.

card.Name: Neo Bahamut
card.Text: You can only cast Neo Bahamut during your Main Phase. Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 8000 damage. Discard all your hand.

card.Name: Firion
card.Text: If you control a [Job (Rebel)] Forward, the cost for playing Firion onto the field is reduced by 2. If your opponent controls 3 or more Forwards, Firion gains +1000 power and Haste. [Put a Backup into the Break Zone]: Until the end of the turn, Firion gains First Strike and Brave.

card.Name: Montblanc
card.Text: [1 Fire CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage for each [Category (FFTA2)] Forward you control.

card.Name: Ruby Dragon
card.Text: [1 Fire CP, 1 CP, put Ruby Dragon into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 8000 damage.

card.Name: Ysayle
card.Text: When Ysayle enters the field, you may search for 1 Ice Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Emina
card.Text: When Emina enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Freeze it. [2 Ice CP, 2 CP, dull, put Emina into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Break it. You can only use this ability during your turn.

card.Name: Scholar
card.Text: When Scholar enters the field, choose 1 Forward of cost 2 or less opponent controls. Dull it and Freeze it.

card.Name: Kazusa
card.Text: When Kazusa enters the field, choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 10000 damage. [1 Ice CP, 1 CP, put Kazusa into the Break Zone]: Choose up to 2 Forwards. Dull them.

card.Name: Bard
card.Text: [Dull, put Bard into the Break Zone]: Each player discards 1 card from his/her hand. You can only use this ability during your turn.

card.Name: Kuja
card.Text: EX BURST: When Kuja enters the field, choose 1 Forward or Monster opponent controls. Dull it and Freeze it. [Put 2 Ice Backups into the Break Zone]: Return Kuja to your hand. You can only use this ability during your Main Phase and if Kuja is in the Break Zone.

card.Name: Kurasame
card.Text: EX BURST: When Kurasame enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Emina)] or [Card Name (Kazusa)] and add it to your hand. The Ice Forwards other than Kurasame you control gain +1000 power.

card.Name: Doomtrain
card.Text: If your opponent has 1 card or less in his/her hand, the cost required to cast Doomtrain is reduced by 2. Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 9000 damage.

card.Name: Militesi Coeurl
card.Text: [0 CP]: Until the end of the turn, Militesi Coeurl also becomes a Forward with 5000 power and 'When Militesi Coeurl attacks, choose 1 Forward. Dull it.' You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Summoner
card.Text: [1 CP, dull, put Summoner into the Break Zone]: Choose up to 2 Ice Summons in your Break Zone. Add them to your hand.

card.Name: Squall
card.Text: If your opponent has 2 cards or less in his/her hand, Squall gains Haste and First Strike. If your opponent has no cards in his/her hand, Squall gains +3000 power.

card.Name: Snow
card.Text: If you control [Card Name (Serah)], Snow gains +1000 power. If you control a [Category (XIII)] Forward other than Snow, Snow gains +1000 power.

card.Name: Snow Giant
card.Text: [1 Ice CP, put Snow Giant into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Dull it and Freeze it.

card.Name: Celes
card.Text: [2 Ice CP]: Celes gains +3000 power until the end of the turn. You may only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Shock Trooper
card.Text: When Shock Trooper attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it and break Shock Trooper.

card.Name: Hades
card.Text: Choose 1 dull Forward. Break it. The owner of this Forward discards 1 card from his/her hand.

card.Name: Borghen
card.Text: When Borghen is put from the field into the Break Zone, your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand.

card.Name: Laguna
card.Text: When Laguna enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Squall)] and add it to your hand

card.Name: Rinoa
card.Text: When Rinoa enters the field, choose 1 Forward other than Rinoa you control. Remove it from the game. Then, play the removed Forward onto the field dull.

card.Name: Locke
card.Text: When Locke enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 [Category (VI)] card among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.Name: Zidane
card.Text: Zidane cannot be chosen by your opponent's abilities. When your opponnent discards a card from his/her hand due to your Summons or abilities, choose 1 Wind Character. Activate it. When Zidane attacks, your opponent reveals his/her hand. Select 1 Forward from their hand. Your opponent discards this card.

card.Name: Cid (II)
card.Text: [Dull]: Search for 1 Backup of cost 1 and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Cid Haze
card.Text: EX BURST: When Cid Haze enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Standard Unit)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: White Mage
card.Text: When White Mage enters the field, choose 1 card in your opponent's Break Zone. Remove it from the game. [1 CP, put White Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 card in your opponent's Break Zone. Remove it from the game.

card.Name: Shinra
card.Text: EX BURST: When Shinra enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Gullwings)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Zu
card.Text: [0 CP]: Until the end of the turn, Zu becomes a Forward with 7000 power and 'When Zu attacks, choose 1 Backup you control. Activate it.' You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Chocobo
card.Text: When Chocobo enters the field, you may play 1 [Card Name (Chocobo)] from your hand onto the field.

card.Name: Choco/Mog
card.Text: EX BURST: Search for 1 [Job (Chocobo)] or [Job (Moogle)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Diablos
card.Text: Choose 1 Forward. Its power becomes 4000 until the end of the turn. Draw 1 card.

card.Name: Paine
card.Text: The [Job (Gullwings)] Forwards you control cannot be chosen by your opponent's Summons. Assault [S]: All the [Job (Gullwings)] you control gain Haste until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Fujin
card.Text: EX BURST: When Fujin enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Seifer)] and add it to your hand. The [Card Name (Seifer)] you control gains First Strike during your turn.

card.Name: Geomancer
card.Text: [Dull, put Geomancer into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 attacking Forward. Deal it 4000 damage.

card.Name: Paul
card.Text: Paul cannot be blocked by a Forward of cost 3 or more. When Paul deals damage to your opponent, your opponent puts the top 5 cards of his/her deck into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Maria
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Category (II)] Forward other than Maria. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. [Dull]: Deal 1000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls. [1 Wind CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. During this turn, the next damage dealt to it is reduced by 3000 instead.

card.Name: Moogle (XI)
card.Text: Retrieve [S] [Dull]: Search for 1 card and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Wingvern
card.Text: [1 Wind CP, 1 CP, put Wyvern into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward of power 9000 or more. Break it.

card.Name: Lezafold
card.Text: When Lezafold enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Play 1 Wind character of cost 5 or less among them to the field and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order. [1 Wind CP, dull, put Lezafold into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. During this turn, the next damage it deals to a Forward becomes 0 instead.

card.Name: Ravager
card.Text: If you control a (Category [FFTA2]) Forward other than Raptor, Raptor gains +2000 power.

card.Name: Rikku
card.Text: The [Job (Gullwings)] Forwards you control cannot be chosen by your opponent's abilities. Escape [S]: Remove Rikku from the Battle. You can only use this ability when Rikku is in Battle.

card.Name: Leon
card.Text: When Leon enters the field, your opponent gains control of Leon. When a [Category (II)] Character of your opponent enters the field, your opponent gains control of Leon.

card.Name: Ajido-Marujido
card.Text: When Ajido-Marujido enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions. 'Cast 1 Summon from your hand without paying the cost.' 'Choose up to 2 Summons in your Break Zone. Add them to your hand.'

card.Name: Dark Knight
card.Text: If Dark Knight receives damage, the damage is increased by 4000 instead.

card.Name: Warrior of Light
card.Text: When Warrior of Light enters the field, choose 1 [Job (Standard Unit]) of cost 2 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field. When a [Job (Standard Unit)] enters your field, Warrior of Light gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. Indomitable Charge [S] [2 Earth CP]: Until the end of the turn, all the Forwards you control gain +3000 power and Brave.

card.Name: Epitav
card.Text: When Epitav enters the field, you may search for 1 [Category (FFCC)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Scholar
card.Text: [2 Earth CP, dull, put Scholar into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Earth Summon in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Machinist
card.Text: [2 Earth CP, 1 CP, dull, put Machinist into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward of power 5000 or less. Break it.

card.Name: Gigas
card.Text: [0 CP]: Until the end of the turn, Gigas also becomes a Forward with 9000 power and 'When Gigas attacks, Gigas will not activate during your next Active Phase.' You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Krile (XIV)
card.Text: [1 Earth CP, 1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward you control. During this turn, it cannot be returned to its owner's hand by your opponent's Summons or abilities.

card.Name: Cait Sith (XIV)
card.Text: [2 Earth CP, dull, put Cait Sith (XIV) into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Summon choosing a Forward you control. Cancel its effect.

card.Name: Cactuar
card.Text: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 4000 damage for each CP of a different Element you paid to cast Cactuar.

card.Name: Titan
card.Text: EX BURST: Choose 1 Forward you control and 1 Forward opponent controls. The former gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. Then, the former deals damage equal to its power to the latter.

card.Name: Pavlov
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Category (FFCC)] Forward. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Hugh Yurg
card.Text: EX BURST: When Hugh Yurg enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Warrior)] and add it to your hand. If you control [Card Name (Leo)], Hugh Yurg gains +1000 power and Brave.

card.Name: Maat
card.Text: The [Job (Monk)] Forwards and [Card Name (Monk)] Forwards you control cannot become dull by your opponent's Summons or abilities. When Maat enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Monk)] or [Card Name (Monk)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Minfilia
card.Text: When Minfilia enters the field, choose up to 2 Characters in your Break Zone. Add them to your hand. [2 Earth CP, 1 CP, dull, put Minfilia into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Light Character or Dark Character. Break it.

card.Name: Mushussu
card.Text: [1 Earth CP, 1 CP, put Mushussu into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Break it.

card.Name: Moogle Brothers
card.Text: When Moogle Brothers enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 [Job (Moogle)] among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order. [Dull, put Moogle Brothers into the Break Zone:] Play 1 [Job (Moogle)] of cost 2 or less from your hand onto the field.

card.Name: Monk
card.Text: [Dull, put Monk into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 7000 damage.

card.Name: Y'shtola
card.Text: Y'shtola cannot be broken by opposing Summons or abilities that don't deal damage. If you control 3 or more [Job (Scion of the Seventh Dawn)] other than Y'shtola, Y'shtola gains Brave. When Y'shtola attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If you control 5 or more [Job (Scion of the Seventh Dawn)] other than Y'shtola, deal it 8000 damage.

card.Name: Leo
card.Text: For each Character other than Leo you control, Leo gains +1000 power. Backups you control can produce CP of any Element.

card.Name: Al-Cid
card.Text: When Al-Cid enters the field, choose 2 Forwards opponent controls. Dull them.

card.Name: Arecia Al-Rashia
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP, dull, discard 1 Summon]: Search for 1 Summon and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Edea
card.Text: [Dull, put Edea into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 [Job (Witch)] in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field. You can only use this ability during your turn.

card.Name: Estinien
card.Text: If you control 5 or more Backups, Estinien gains Haste. When Estinien is blocked, break the blocking Forward. [1 Lightning CP]: Activate Estinien. Estinien can attack once more this turn. You can only use this ability during your turn and only once per turn.

card.Name: Estinien
card.Text: You can only pay with CP produced by Lightning Backups to play Estinien from your hand onto the field. Haste First Strike

card.Name: Kain
card.Text: When a Dark Forward of your opponent enters the field, your opponent gains control of Kain. When a Dark Forward you control is put from the field into the Break Zone, your opponent gains control of Kain.

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: [3 Lightning CP, 3 CP, dull, put Black Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 9000 damage.

card.Name: Quetzalcotl

card.Text: EX BURST: When Lightning enters the field, choose 1 [Card Name (Odin)] in your Break Zone. You may put it on top of your deck. Gestalt Drive [S] [1 Lightning CP, 1 CP, dull, discard 1 [Card Name (Odin)]]: Choose up to 2 Forwards of cost 4 or less. Break them.

card.Text: For each [Category (FFT)] Forward you control other than Ramza, Ramza gains +1000 power. [3 CP]: Choose 1 [Category (FFT)] Forward you control. It gains +1000 power, Haste, and First Strike until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Dragoon
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP]: Dragoon gains Haste until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Blue Mage

card.Name: Artemicion
card.Text: When Artemicion enters the field, place any number of cards from your hand at the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, draw the same number of cards.

card.Name: Famfrit, the Darkening Cloud
card.Text: EX BURST: Both players select 1 Forward they control and put it into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Izayoi

card.Name: Ephemeral Summoner

card.Name: Eiko

card.Name: Eiko

card.Name: Dancer

card.Name: Garnet
card.Text: Garnet cannot be chosen by your opponent's Summons. When you cast a Summon, all the Forwards you control gain +1000 power until the end of the turn. [2 Water]: Cast 1 Summon of cost 3 or less from your hand without paying its cost.

card.Name: Cagnazzo
card.Text: If Cagnazzo receives damage during your opponent's turn, reduce the damage by 4000 instead. When Cagnazzo enters the field, until the end of the turn, all the Forwards opponent controls lose 1000 power for every 2 Water Characters you control.

card.Name: Ghido
card.Text: Ghido does not activate during the Active Phase. [1 Water CP]: Activate Ghido. [1 Water CP, 1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward of cost 5 or more opponent controls. Put it on top of its owner's deck.

card.Name: Quacho Queen
card.Text: [1 Water CP, 1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. It gains +1000 power for each Forward you control until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Summoner

card.Name: Syldra
card.Text: Choose up to 2 Forwards opponent controls. Return them to their owners' hand.

card.Name: White Mage
card.Text: If White Mage or a Forward forming a party with White Mage receives damage, the damage decreases by 3000 instead.

card.Text: When one of your Water Characters other than Ceodore enters the field, choose 1 Forward you control. Select 1 from the following. 'It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.' 'It gains First Strike until the end of the turn.' 'It gains Brave until the end of the turn.'

card.Name: Knight

card.Name: Porom

card.Text: If your opponent doesn't control Forwards, put Famed Mimic Gogo into the Break Zone. Power Hit [S]: Choose 1 Forward. Put it into the Break Zone. You can only use this ability if Famed Mimic Gogo has received damage this turn.

card.Name: Bomb

You can only use this ability while Sabin is attacking. Rising Phoenix [S] [2 Fire CP, 2 CP]: Deal 8000 damage to all Forwards. You can only use this ability while Sabin is attacking.

You can only use this ability is Ozma is a Forward.

card.Name: Claidie

card.Name: Estinien
card.Text: You can only pay with CP produced by Lightning Backups to play Estinien from your hand onto the field. Haste First Strike

card.Text: EX BURST: Choose 1 Forward you control and 1 Forward opponent controls. Until the end of the turn, the former gains +2000 power and the latter loses 2000 power.

card.Name: Colossus
card.Text: [0 CP]: Until the end of the turn, Colossus also becomes a Forward with 7000 power and 'When Colossus attacks, deal 1000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.' You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Seifer
card.Text: When Seifer blocks or is blocked, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. It loses 2000 power until the end of the turn. When Seifer deals damage to your opponent, all the Forwards opponent controls lose 2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Seifer
card.Text: EX BURST: When Seifer enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Witch)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Ninja
card.Text: When Ninja enters the field, choose 1 damaged Forward. Deal it 5000 damage.

card.Name: Diepvern
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP, 1 CP, put Diepvern into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward of cost 3 or less. Break it.

card.Name: Frimelda
card.Text: When Frimelda enters the field, choose 1 active Forward opponent controls. Deal it 4000 damage for each [Job (Sword Saint)] you control.

card.Name: Ewen
card.Text: If your opponent controls 3 or more Forwards, Ewen gains Haste and 'Ewen cannot be blocked.'

card.Name: Raijin
card.Text: The [Card Name (Seifer)] you control gains Haste. Raijin Special [S] [Dull]: Choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 8000 damage. You can only use this ability if you control [Card Name (Seifer)] and [Card Name (Fujin)].

card.Name: Ramuh
card.Text: Select up to 2 of the 4 following actions: 'Choose 1 Monster of cost 2 or less. Break it.' 'Choose 1 Forward of cost 4 or less. Dull it.' 'Choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 7000 damage.' 'Choose 1 Lightning Forward. It gains Haste until the end of the turn.'

card.Name: Ricard
card.Text: EX BURST: When Ricard enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Scott)] or [Card Name (Minwu)] or [Card Name (Josef)] and add it to your hand. Ricard must block if possible.

card.Name: Dragoon
card.Text: When Dragoon enters the field, choose 1 Forward. It gains First Strike until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Dragoon
card.Text: For each [Job (Dragoon)] and [Card Name (Dragoon)] other than Dragoon you control, Dragoon gains +2000 power.

card.Name: Aymeric
card.Job: Lord Commander of the Temple Knights
card.Text: Aymeric doesn't receive damage that is less than his power. When Aymeric attacks, all the Forwards other than Aymeric you control gain +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Ultimecia
card.Text: Dull 3 active Forwards: Choose 1 active Forward. Dull it. Knight's Arrow [S] [1 Water CP]: Choose 2 Forwards. Dull the first Forward and activate the other.

card.Name: Thordan VII
card.Text: EX BURST: When Thordan VII enters the field, you may search for 1 card and add it to your hand. When Thordan VII is put from the field into the Break Zone, draw 1 card.

card.Name: Eiko
card.Text: If you have cast a Summon this turn, the cost required to play Eiko onto the field is reduced by 2 (it cannot become 0). Jewel [S] (Dull): Search for 1 Summon and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Sahagin
card.Text: [0 CP]: Until the end of the turn, Sahagin also becomes a Forward with 6000 power and 'When Sahagin attacks, draw 1 card, then discard 1 card from your hand.' You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Shuyin
card.Text: When Shuyin enters the field, choose 1 Forward with a power inferior to Shuyin's. You gain control of this Forward until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Summoner
card.Text: [Dull, put Summoner into the Break Zone]: Cast a Summon from your hand. The cost required to cast is reduced by 2 (it cannot become 0).

card.Name: Templar
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. During this turn, the damage dealt to it is reduced by 2000 instead.

card.Name: Scott
card.Text: For each Backup you control, Scott gains +1000 power. If you control [Card Name (Hilda)], Scott and the [Card Name (Gordon)] you control gain Brave.

card.Name: Dracobaltian
card.Text: [1 Water CP, 1 CP, put Dracobaltian into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Return it to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Siren
card.Text: EX BURST: Choose 1 Water Forward. It gains +4000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Astrologian
card.Text: [Dull]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Backup, add it to your hand. If it is not a Backup, put it into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Chime
card.Text: If you control [Card Name (Leo)], the cost required to play Chime onto the field is reduced by 2. When Chime enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. You may return 1 Forward you control to its owner's hand. If you do so, return the chosen Forward to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Paladin
card.Text: If Paladin is dealt damage by a Forward, reduce the damage by 4000 instead.

card.Name: Pieuje
card.Text: EX BURST: When Pieuje enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Prince)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Hilda
card.Text: When Hilda enters the field, draw 1 card for each Forward you control. You can only draw up to 4 cards with this ability.

card.Name: Minwu
card.Text: When Minwu enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 Summon among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order. When Minwu attacks, you may cast 1 Summon of cost 4 or less from your hand without paying the cost.

card.Name: Yuna
card.Text: When Yuna enters the field, play 1 [Job (Gullwings)] Forward from your hand onto the field or search for 1 [Job (Gullwings)] Forward other than [Card Name (Yuna)] and add it to your hand. [1 CP, remove 3 Summons in the Break Zone from the game]: Choose 1 [Job (Gullwings)] Forward. Activate it. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Leviathan
card.Text: Select 1 of the 3 following actions. 'Choose 1 Forward. Return it to its owner's hand.' 'Choose 1 action ability. Cancel its effect.' 'During this turn, the Forwards you control don't receive any damage from Summons.'

card.Name: Leila
card.Text: When Leila enters the field, choose 1 [Card Name (Viking)] of cost 3 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field.

card.Name: Hraesvelgr
card.Text: When Hraesvelgr enters the field, select 1 of the 3 following actions. 'Skip your opponent's Attack Phase in their next turn. Remove the top 5 cards of your deck from the game.' 'Choose 1 Character in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.' 'Remove all the cards in your opponent's Break Zone from the game.'

card.Name: Materia
card.Text: Materia can be played onto the field even if you control other Light Characters. You can play 2 or more Light Characters onto the field. When Materia enters the field, you may search for 1 Light Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Spiritus
card.Text: Spiritus can be played onto the field even if you control other Dark Characters. You can play 2 or more Dark Characters onto the field. When Spiritus enters the field, you may search for 1 Dark Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Nidhogg
card.Text: When Nidhogg enters the field, your opponent randomly removes 1 card from his/her hand from the game. When Nidhogg enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Remove it from the game.

card.Name: Auron
card.Text: The [Category (X)] Forwards you control gain Brave. [Dull]: Choose 1 blocking Forward. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Aigis
card.Text: The [Job (Warrior of Light)] Forwards other than Aigis you control gain Brave. When Aigis enters the field, you may play 1 Forward of cost 2 from your hand onto the field.

card.Name: Red Mage
card.Text: When Red Mage enters the field, if the cost paid to play Red Mage included Ice CP, your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand. [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 1000 damage.

card.Name: Fritt
card.Text: Fritt is also a Monster in all situations. When Fritt is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Ifrit)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Ifrit
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage. If Ifrit results from an EX Burst, deal it 8000 damage instead.

card.Name: Varuna
card.Text: When a Forward you control deals damage to your opponent, Varuna also becomes a Forward with 8000 power and Brave. (This effect does not end at the end of the turn. This ability will not trigger if Varuna is a Forward.)

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: [1 Fire CP, dull, put Black Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 4000 damage.

card.Name: Sazh
card.Text: EX Burst: When Sazh enters the field, you may search for 1 Fire Summon and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Samurai
card.Text: When Samurai enters the field, choose 1 Fire Forward. It gains +2000 power and Brave until the end of the turn. [Dull, put Samurai into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Fire Forward. It gains +2000 power and Brave until the end of the turn. You can only use this ability if you have received 5 points of damage or more.

card.Name: Jecht
card.Text: If you have received 4 points of damage or more, the cost required for playing Jecht onto the field is reduced by 4. When Jecht enters the field, if you have at least 2 points of damage more than your opponent, Jecht deals your opponent 1 point of damage.

card.Name: Summoner
card.Text: When Summoner enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If the cost paid to play Summoner included Lightning CP, dull it.

card.Name: Sol
card.Text: If you control a Job (Warrior of Light) Forward other than Sol, Sol gains 2000 power and Haste.

card.Name: Berserker
card.Text: When Berserker deals damage to your opponent or to a Forward, break Berserker.

card.Name: Baugauven
card.Text: When Baugauven enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If the cost to play Baugauven was only paid with Fire CP, deal it 7000 damage. Final Backdraft [S] [2 Fire CP, dull): Choose 1 Forward of any Element except Fire. Deal it 10000 damage.

card.Name: Fang
card.Text: If you control 2 or more [Category (XIII)] Characters, Fang gains First Strike. If you control 4 or more [Category (XIII)] Characters, Fang gains Haste. If you control 6 or more [Category (XIII)] Characters, Fang gains +3000 power.

card.Name: Bomb
card.Text: [Put Bomb into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 3000 damage, and deal 2000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls. [Discard Bomb]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage. You can only use this ability if Bomb is in your hand.

card.Name: Meeth
card.Text: When Meeth enters the field, you may discard 1 card. If you do so, search for 1 Forward of the same cost as the discarded card and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Lann
card.Text: If you control [Card Name (Reynn)], Lann gains +1000 power. When Lann deals damage to your opponent or to a Forward, choose 1 Forward. You may pay [3 Fire CP, 1 CP]. If you do so, deal it damage equal to Lann's power.

card.Name: Latov
card.Text: When Latov enters the field, choose 1 [Card Name (Chelinka)] or [Card Name (Yuri)] in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field.

card.Name: Lulu
card.Text: When Lulu enters the field, choose 1 Forward. You may put 1 Backup other than Lulu you control into the Break Zone. If you do so, deal it 7000 damage.

card.Name: Reynn
card.Text: EX Burst: When Reynn enters the field, you may search for 1 [Category (WOFF)] Monster and add it to your hand. The [Category (WOFF)] Monsters you control gain +1000 power.

card.Name: Emperor (FFL)
card.Text: When Emperor (FFL) or a [Category (FFL)] Character enters your field, choose 1 Forward of cost 5 or more opponent controls. Dull it and Freeze it.

card.Name: Eduardo
card.Text: When a [Job (Bard)] Forward you control attacks, your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand.

card.Name: Bard
card.Text: When Bard enters the field, choose up to 2 Forwards opponent controls. Freeze them. [Dull, put Bard into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Dull it and Freeze it.

card.Name: Cu Chaspel
card.Text: The [Card Name (Galdes)] you control gains +1000 power. When Cu Chaspel enters the field, your opponent selects 1 Forward he/she controls. Dull it and Freeze it.

card.Name: Gremlin
card.Text: When your opponent discards a card from his/her hand due to your Summons or abilities, Gremlin also becomes a Forward with 7000 power and 'When Gremlin is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Dull it and Freeze it.' (This effect does not end at the end of the turn. This ability will not trigger if Gremlin is a Forward.)

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: When Black Mage enters the field, if the cost paid to play Black Mage included Water CP, draw 2 cards. Then, discard 1 card from your hand.

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: [1 Ice CP, dull]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 2000 damage.

card.Name: Kefka
card.Text: When Kefka enters the field, if the cost to play Kefka was only paid with Ice CP, your opponent may discard 2 cards. If he/she doesn't, Freeze all the Forwards opponent controls. When Kefka enters the field, if the cost to play Kefka was paid with CP of exactly 3 different Elements, choose up to 1 Forward, up to 1 Backup and up to 1 Monster. Dull them and Freeze them.

card.Name: Goblin
card.Text: [Put Goblin into the Break Zone]: Search for 1 Monster and add it to your hand. [Discard Goblin]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 3000 damage. You can only use this ability if Goblin is in your hand.

card.Name: Shiva
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose up to 2 Forwards opponent controls. Freeze them. If Shiva results from an EX Burst, dull them and Freeze them instead.

card.Name: Jihl Nabaat
card.Text: When Jihl Nabaat enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions: 'For each [Job (PSICOM)] you control, your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand.' 'Deal 4000 damage to all the dull Forwards opponent controls.'

card.Name: Snow
card.Text: When a Forward you control attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Dull it.

card.Name: Sephiroth
card.Text: When Sephiroth enters the field, your opponent discards 2 cards from his/her hand. When Sephiroth attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If your opponent has no cards in his/her hand, dull it and Freeze it. Shadow Flare [S] [1 Ice CP]: Your opponent discards 2 cards from his/her hand. You can only use this ability during your Main Phase.

card.Name: Serah
card.Text: When Serah enters the field, choose as many Characters as the [Category (XIII)] Characters you control. Dull them. [Dull 2 active [Category (XIII)] Characters]: Choose 1 Forward. Freeze it.

card.Name: Terra
card.Text: When you cast a Summon, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Dull it.

card.Name: Time Mage
card.Text: When Time Mage enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Dull it and Freeze it.

card.Name: Bablizz
card.Text: Bablizz is also a Monster in all situations. When Bablizz is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Shiva)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Mystic Knight
card.Text: When Mystic Knight enters the field, choose up to 2 Backups. If the cost to play Mystic Knight included Wind CP, activate them. The cost required to cast Ice Summons is reduced by 1 (it cannot become 0).

card.Name: Yunalesca
card.Text: When Yunalesca enters the field or attacks, choose 1 Forward. You may discard 1 Summon from your hand. If you do so, dull it and Freeze it.

card.Name: Yeul
card.Text: [1 Ice CP, dull, put Yeul into the Break Zone]: Search for 1 Forward and put it under the top card of your deck.

card.Name: Lasswell
card.Text: When Lasswell enters the field, choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 5000 damage. If you control 5 or more Ice Characters, deal it 7000 damage instead.

card.Name: Aleria
card.Text: EX Burst: When Aleria enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Chelinka)] or [Card Name (Yuri)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Alhanalem
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage. You can only use this ability if you control [Card Name (Chelinka)] or [Card Name (Yuri)]. [Dull]: Deal 2000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls. You can only use this ability if you control [Card Name (Chelinka)] and [Card Name (Yuri)].

card.Name: Alexander
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward of cost 5 or more opponent controls. Return it to its owner's hand. If Alexander results from an EX Burst, break it instead.

card.Name: Vata
card.Text: When Vata enters the field, if the cost to play Vata was only paid with Wind CP, activate all the Wind Backups you control.

card.Name: Dancer
card.Text: [Dull]: Deal 1000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Ranger
card.Text: When Ranger enters the field, choose 1 Monster of cost 3 or less opponent controls. If the cost paid to play Ranger includes Earth CP, break it. When Ranger attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 2000 damage.

card.Name: Kelger
card.Text: When Kelger enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Play 1 [Job (Dawn Warrior)] among them to the field and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.Name: Condor
card.Text: When a Backup enters your field, if you control 5 or more Backups, Condor also becomes a Forward with 8000 power and 'When Condor attacks, activate all the Wind Characters other than Condor you control.' (This effect does not end at the end of the turn. This ability will not trigger if Condor is a Forward.)

card.Name: Cactuar Conductor
card.Text: When Cactuar Conductor enters the field, choose 1 Forward. During this turn, the next damage dealt to it becomes 0 instead. [2 Wind CP, dull, put Cactuar Conductor into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. During this turn, the next damage dealt to it becomes 0 instead.

card.Name: Thief
card.Text: [2 Wind CP, dull, put Thief into the Break Zone]: Your opponent puts the top 2 cards of his/her deck into the Break Zone. If both cards of are the same Element, draw 1 card.

card.Name: Zu
card.Text: [Put Zu into the Break Zone]: Activate all the Backups you control. [Discard Zu]: Choose up to 2 Backups you control. Activate them. You can only use this ability if Zu is in your hand.

card.Name: Chelinka
card.Text: If a [Category (FFCC)] Character you control deals damage to a Forward, the damage increases by 1000 instead. When Chelinka enters the field, deal 1000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls. When Chelinka forms a party with [Card Name (Yuri)] and attacks, choose 1 Forward or Monster. Break it.

card.Name: Chocobo
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward other than Chocobo. It gains +3000 power until the end of the turn. When that Forward leaves the field this turn, put Chocobo into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Dorgann
card.Text: When a Backup enters your field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Remove it from the game for as long as Dorgann is on the field.

card.Name: Gnash
card.Text: EX Burst: When Gnash enters the field, choose 1 Forward of cost 1 opponent controls or 1 Monster of cost 2 or less opponent controls. Break them.

card.Name: Ninja
card.Text: When Ninja enters the field, choose 1 Forward. If the cost paid to play Ninja included Fire CP, deal it 4000 damage.

card.Name: Bartz
card.Text: When Bartz enters the field, choose up to 2 [Category (V)] Characters. Activate them. Spellblade [S]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 5000 damage. Dual-Wield [S]: Until the end of the turn, Bartz gains First Strike and Bartz's power becomes 10000. Rapid Fire [S]: Until the end of the turn, Bartz gains Haste, Braze and 'Bartz can attack 3 times this turn.' You can only use this ability if Bartz used Spellblade and Dual-Wield this turn.

card.Name: Bartholomew
card.Text: When Bartholomew enters the field, you may play 1 [Card Name (Hope)] from your hand onto the field. [2 Wind CP, dull, put Bartholomew into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Activate it. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Wind Drake
card.Text: EX Burst: When Wind Drake enters the field, choose 1 Forward. It cannot attack until the end of your opponent's turn./

card.Name: Hope
card.Text: If you control a [Job (Father)] and a [Job (Mother)], Hope gains +2000 power and 'Hope cannot be chosen by your opponent's abilities'.

card.Name: Rem
card.Text: EX Burst: When Rem enters the field, you may discard 1 card. If you do so, search for 1 [Job (Class Zero Cadet)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Asmodai
card.Text: When Asmodai enters the field, choose 1 dull Forward opponent controls. If the cost to play Asmodai was only paid with Earth CP, break it.

card.Name: Vanille
card.Text: When Vanille enters the field, choose 1 dull Forward. Select 1 number and reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is of the same cost as the selected number, break it. Poisonga [S] [1 Earth CP, dull]: At the end of this turn, dull all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Carbuncle
card.Text: Back Attack

card.Name: Galuf
card.Text: Galuf cannot be broken during your turn. When Galuf attacks, choose 1 Forward. You may pay [2 Earth CP]. If you do so, it must block Galuf this turn if possible. Stop [S]: Choose up to 2 Forwards. They cannot attack this turn.

card.Name: Krile
card.Text: The cost required to cast your Summons can be paid with CP of any Element. When you cast a Summon, choose 1 Forward. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn. [Discard 1 Summon]: Until the end of the turn, Krile cannot be chosen by your opponent's abilities.

card.Name: Kolka
card.Text: When Kolka enters the field, you may search for 1 Earth Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Zaghnal
card.Text: When a Character of cost 6 or more enters your field, Zaghnal becomes a Forward with 9000 power. (This effect does not end at the end of the turn. This ability will not trigger if Zaghnal becomes a Forward.)

card.Name: Shantotto
card.Text: [1 CP]: Name 1 Element other than Light and Dark. Shantotto becomes the named Element until the end of the turn. You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Summoner
card.Text: When Summoner enters the field, choose 1 Forward. If the cost to play Summoner included Ice CP, Freeze it.

card.Name: Xezat
card.Text: [2 Earth CP]: Xezat gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. [1 Earth CP, 1 Ice CP]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 4000 damage. [1 Earth CP, 1 Wind CP]: Choose 1 Forward. Activate it. [1 Earth CP, 1 Lightning CP]: Choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 4000 damage.

card.Name: Tama
card.Text: [1 Earth CP, dull, put Tama into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 [Category (WOFF)] card in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Tilika
card.Text: You can discard Light and Dark Element cards from your hand to produce CP. (Light cards produce 2 Light CP each and Dark cards produce 2 Dark CP each.)

card.Name: Necromancer
card.Text: [3 Earth CP, 1 CP, dull, put Necromancer into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 [Job (Standard Unit)] in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field.

card.Name: Noctis
card.Text: EX Burst: When you receive damage, choose up to 1 Forward. If you have received 6 points of damage, break it. When you receive damage, choose up to 1 Forward opponent controls. Noctis and the chosen Forward deal damage equal to their respective power to the other. [2 Earth CP, 2 CP]: During this turn, the next damage dealt to Noctis becomes 0 instead.

card.Name: Bahamutian Soldier
card.Text: If you control a Monster, Bahamutian Soldier gains +2000 power.

card.Name: Geomancer
card.Text: [1 Earth CP, dull, put Geomancer into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Prishe
card.Text: The cost required to play Prishe onto the field is reduced by 1 for each [Card Name (Prishe)] in your Break Zone. When Prishe enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it damage equal to Prishe's power.

card.Name: Flan
card.Text: [Put Flan into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. If your opponent doesn't pay [1 CP], it cannot attack or block this turn. [Discard Flan]: Choose 1 blocking Forward. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn. You can only use this ability if Flan is in your hand.

card.Name: Moogle (FFCC)]
card.Text: The [Job (Moogle)] Backups you control can produce CP of any Element.

card.Name: Monk
card.Text: When Monk enters the field, choose 1 damaged Forward. If the cost to pay Monk included Lightning CP, deal it 5000 damage.

card.Name: Yojimbo
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward you control and 1 Forward opponent controls. The first gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. Then, each Forward deals damage equal to its power to the other. If Yojimbo results from an EX Burst, the former gains +3000 power until the end of the turn instead. Then, each Forward deals damage equal to its power to the other.

card.Name: Red Mage
card.Text: When Red Mage enters the field, choose 1 Forward of cost 3 or less opponent controls. If the cost paid to play Red Mage included Water CP, return it to its owner's hand. [2 Lightning CP, dull, put Red Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward of cost 4 or less. Break it.

card.Name: Argy
card.Text: When Argy is put from the field into the Break Zone, select 1 of the 3 following abilities: 'Choose 1 Forward. It gains Haste until the end of the turn.' 'Choose 1 Forward. Activate it.' 'Choose 1 Backup of cost 1 in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field.'

card.Name: Exdeath
card.Text: When Exdeath enters the field, choose 1 Forward from either player's Break Zone. If its cost is equal to or les than the number of Backups you control, play it onto your field.

card.Name: Gilgamesh
card.Text: For each [Card Name (Gilgamesh)] in your Break Zone, Gilgamesh gains +1000 power. If Gilgamesh has 10000 power or more, Gilgamesh gains Brave and can attack twice in the same turn. When Gilgamesh is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may pay [X CP]. If you do so, search for 1 [Card Name (Gilgamesh)] of cost X and play it onto the field dull.

card.Name: Coeurl
card.Text: [Put Coeurl into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains +3000 power, Haste, First Strike and Brave. [Discard Coeurl]: Choose 1 Monster of cost 1. Break it. You can only use this ability if Coeurl is in your hand.

card.Name: Gladiator
card.Text: When your opponent casts a Summon, Gladiator gains +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: The Emperor
card.Text: When The Emperor enters the field, choose 2 Forwards opponent controls. Dull them. During your turn, when a Forward opponent controls becomes dull, choose 1 active Forward opponent controls. Deal it 3000 damage.

card.Name: Thancred
card.Text: When Thancred enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Dull it. When Thancred enters the field, until the end of the turn, if the CP paid to play Thancred was only produced by [Category (XIV)] Backups, Thancred gains +2000 power, Haste and First Strike.

card.Name: Zapt
card.Text: Zapt is also a Monster in all situations. When Zapt is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Ramuh)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Seymour
card.Text: EX Burst: When Seymour enters the field, search for 1 Summon and put it on top of your deck. Lance of Atrophy [S] [2 Lightning CP]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Summon, you may cast it without paying the cost.

card.Name: Cid Previa
card.Text: When Cid Previa enters the field, choose 1 Lightning Backup of cost 3 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field. [1 Lightning CP, dull, put Cid Previa into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage.

card.Name: Noel
card.Text: Haste When Noel enters the field, until the end of the turn, Noel gains +3000 power and 'When Noel deals damage to your opponent, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it'.

card.Name: Barbara
card.Text: The [Job (Dragoon)] and [Card Name (Dragoon)] you control gain Haste. [1 CP]: Choose 1 [Job (Dragoon)] or [Card Name (Dragoon)] other than Barbara. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Flanborg
card.Text: When a Forward of cost 3 or less opponent controls is put from the field into the Break Zone, Flanborg becomes a Forward with 7000 power and 'If Flanborg is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may search for 1 [Job (Militarised Flan)] and add it to your hand'. (This effect does not end at the end of the turn. This ability will not trigger if Flanborg is a Forward.)

card.Name: Cannoneer

card.Text: [1 Lightning CP]: Until the end of the turn, Twilight Odin also becomes a Forward with 7000 power and 'When Twilight Odin deals damage to your opponent, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it.' You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Scholar
card.Text: [Dull, put Scholar into the Break Zone]: Choose up to 2 active Forwards opponent controls. Deal them 3000 damage.

card.Name: Cid of Clan Gully
card.Text: When Cid of Clan Gully enters the field, you may search for 1 [Category (FFTA2)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Khalia Chival
card.Text: When Khalia Chival enters the field, you may searcfh for 1 [Job (Agito Cadet)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Quon

card.Name: Black Knight

card.Name: Thancred
card.Text: If you control a [Job (Scion of the Seventh Dawn)] other than Thancred, Thancred gains +1000 power. If Thancred receives damage while dull, the damage is reduced by 2000 instead.

card.Name: Zemus
card.Text: [X CP, dull]: Choose 1 Lightning Forward in your Break Zone. If its cost is X, play it onto the field. You can only use this ability during your Main Phase.

card.Name: Destin
card.Text: The cost required to play [Card Name (Claidie)] or [Card Name (Trion)] or [Card Name (Pieuje)] onto the field is reduced by 1 (it cannot become 0).

card.Name: Bunkerbeast
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 blocking Forward. It loses 2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Trion
card.Text: The [Job (Knight)] other than Trion you control gain +1000 power.

card.Name: Naghi
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward blocking a [Job (Class Zero Cadet)]. It loses 1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Ravager
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP, dull]: Choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 4000 damage.

card.Name: Cannoneer

card.Name: Dark Knight
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP]: Deal 1000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls and 2000 damage to Dark Knight.

card.Name: Lightning
card.Text: Haste At the end of the turn, return Lightning to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Ramuh
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 damaged Forward. Deal it 7000 damage.

card.Text: The cost required to play Ramza onto the field is reduced by 1 for each Forward you control (it cannot become 0). For each Forward other than Ramza you control, Ramza gains +1000 power. If Ramza has 10000 power or more, Ramza gains Haste and 'When Ramza attacks, choose 1 Forward of cost 3 or less opponent controls. Break it.'

card.Name: Dragoon
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP]: Dragoon gains First Strike until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Louisoix

card.Name: Andoria
card.Text: When a party you control deals damage to your opponent, draw 1 card.

card.Name: Vossler

card.Name: Aria (III)
card.Text: EX Burst: When Aria (III) enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Warrior of Light)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Ozma
card.Text: [0 CP]: Until the end of the turn, Ozma also becomes a Forward with 8000 power and 'Ozma doesn't receive damage from Dark cards.' You can only use this ability once per turn. Flare Star [S] [2 Water CP, 2 CP, dull]: All the Forwards opponent controls lose 2000 power for each CP required to play them until the end of the turn. You can only use this ability is Ozma is a Forward.

card.Name: Ondore
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Category (XII)] Forward you control. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Cloud of Darkness

When Cloud of Darkness attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. It loses 1000 power for each Forward you control until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Curilla

card.Name: Claidie
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Job (Prince)] Forward or [Job (Knight)] Forward. Activate it.

card.Name: Schrodinger

If it is a Monster, your opponent selects 1 Forward he/she controls and return it to its owner's hand. If it is a Summon, draw 2 cards.

When Wol is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 [Job (Warrior or Light)] of cost 3 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field.

card.Name: Eald'narche

At the beginning of your Main Phase 1, select 1 Element. Kam'lanaut becomes that Element (this effect does not end at the end of the turn).

card.Text: [Dull]: Search for 1 Backup of cost 1 and add it to your hand.
