card.Text: [Dull, put Monk into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 7000 damage.

card.Name: Y'shtola
card.Text: Y'shtola cannot be broken by opposing Summons or abilities that don't deal damage. If you control 3 or more [Job (Scion of the Seventh Dawn)] other than Y'shtola, Y'shtola gains Brave. When Y'shtola attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If you control 5 or more [Job (Scion of the Seventh Dawn)] other than Y'shtola, deal it 8000 damage.

card.Name: Leo
card.Text: For each Character other than Leo you control, Leo gains +1000 power. Backups you control can produce CP of any Element.

card.Name: Al-Cid
card.Text: When Al-Cid enters the field, choose 2 Forwards opponent controls. Dull them.

card.Name: Arecia Al-Rashia
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP, dull, discard 1 Summon]: Search for 1 Summon and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Edea
card.Text: [Dull, put Edea into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 [Job (Witch)] in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field. You can only use this ability during your turn.

card.Name: Estinien
card.Text: If you control 5 or more Backups, Estinien gains Haste. When Estinien is blocked, break the blocking Forward. [1 Lightning CP]: Activate Estinien. Estinien can attack once more this turn. You can only use this ability during your turn and only once per turn.

card.Name: Estinien
card.Text: You can only pay with CP produced by Lightning Backups to play Estinien from your hand onto the field. Haste First Strike

card.Name: Kain
card.Text: When a Dark Forward of your opponent enters the field, your opponent gains control of Kain. When a Dark Forward you control is put from the field into the Break Zone, your opponent gains control of Kain.

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: [3 Lightning CP, 3 CP, dull, put Black Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 9000 damage.

card.Name: Quetzalcotl
card.Text: EX BURST: Choose 1 Forward you control and 1 Forward opponent controls. Until the end of the turn, the former gains +2000 power and the latter loses 2000 power.

card.Name: Colossus
card.Text: [0 CP]: Until the end of the turn, Colossus also becomes a Forward with 7000 power and 'When Colossus attacks, deal 1000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.' You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Seifer
card.Text: When Seifer blocks or is blocked, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. It loses 2000 power until the end of the turn. When Seifer deals damage to your opponent, all the Forwards opponent controls lose 2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Seifer
card.Text: EX BURST: When Seifer enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Witch)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Ninja
card.Text: When Ninja enters the field, choose 1 damaged Forward. Deal it 5000 damage.

card.Name: Diepvern
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP, 1 CP, put Diepvern into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward of cost 3 or less. Break it.

card.Name: Frimelda
card.Text: When Frimelda enters the field, choose 1 active Forward opponent controls. Deal it 4000 damage for each [Job (Sword Saint)] you control.

card.Name: Ewen
card.Text: If your opponent controls 3 or more Forwards, Ewen gains Haste and 'Ewen cannot be blocked.'

card.Name: Raijin
card.Text: The [Card Name (Seifer)] you control gains Haste. Raijin Special [S] [Dull]: Choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 8000 damage. You can only use this ability if you control [Card Name (Seifer)] and [Card Name (Fujin)].

card.Name: Ramuh
card.Text: Select up to 2 of the 4 following actions: 'Choose 1 Monster of cost 2 or less. Break it.' 'Choose 1 Forward of cost 4 or less. Dull it.' 'Choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 7000 damage.' 'Choose 1 Lightning Forward. It gains Haste until the end of the turn.'

card.Name: Ricard
card.Text: EX BURST: When Ricard enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Scott)] or [Card Name (Minwu)] or [Card Name (Josef)] and add it to your hand. Ricard must block if possible.

card.Name: Dragoon
card.Text: When Dragoon enters the field, choose 1 Forward. It gains First Strike until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Dragoon
card.Text: For each [Job (Dragoon)] and [Card Name (Dragoon)] other than Dragoon you control, Dragoon gains +2000 power.

card.Name: Aymeric
card.Job: Lord Commander of the Temple Knights
card.Text: Aymeric doesn't receive damage that is less than his power. When Aymeric attacks, all the Forwards other than Aymeric you control gain +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Ultimecia
card.Text: Dull 3 active Forwards: Choose 1 active Forward. Dull it. Knight's Arrow [S] [1 Water CP]: Choose 2 Forwards. Dull the first Forward and activate the other.

card.Name: Thordan VII
card.Text: EX BURST: When Thordan VII enters the field, you may search for 1 card and add it to your hand. When Thordan VII is put from the field into the Break Zone, draw 1 card.

card.Name: Eiko
card.Text: If you have cast a Summon this turn, the cost required to play Eiko onto the field is reduced by 2 (it cannot become 0). Jewel [S] (Dull): Search for 1 Summon and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Sahagin
card.Text: [0 CP]: Until the end of the turn, Sahagin also becomes a Forward with 6000 power and 'When Sahagin attacks, draw 1 card, then discard 1 card from your hand.' You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Shuyin
card.Text: When Shuyin enters the field, choose 1 Forward with a power inferior to Shuyin's. You gain control of this Forward until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Summoner
card.Text: [Dull, put Summoner into the Break Zone]: Cast a Summon from your hand. The cost required to cast is reduced by 2 (it cannot become 0).

card.Name: Templar
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. During this turn, the damage dealt to it is reduced by 2000 instead.

card.Name: Scott
card.Text: For each Backup you control, Scott gains +1000 power. If you control [Card Name (Hilda)], Scott and the [Card Name (Gordon)] you control gain Brave.

card.Name: Dracobaltian
card.Text: [1 Water CP, 1 CP, put Dracobaltian into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Return it to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Siren
card.Text: EX BURST: Choose 1 Water Forward. It gains +4000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Astrologian
card.Text: [Dull]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Backup, add it to your hand. If it is not a Backup, put it into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Chime
card.Text: If you control [Card Name (Leo)], the cost required to play Chime onto the field is reduced by 2. When Chime enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. You may return 1 Forward you control to its owner's hand. If you do so, return the chosen Forward to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Paladin
card.Text: If Paladin is dealt damage by a Forward, reduce the damage by 4000 instead.

card.Name: Pieuje
card.Text: EX BURST: When Pieuje enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Prince)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Hilda
card.Text: When Hilda enters the field, draw 1 card for each Forward you control. You can only draw up to 4 cards with this ability.

card.Name: Minwu
card.Text: When Minwu enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 Summon among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order. When Minwu attacks, you may cast 1 Summon of cost 4 or less from your hand without paying the cost.

card.Name: Yuna
card.Text: When Yuna enters the field, play 1 [Job (Gullwings)] Forward from your hand onto the field or search for 1 [Job (Gullwings)] Forward other than [Card Name (Yuna)] and add it to your hand. [1 CP, remove 3 Summons in the Break Zone from the game]: Choose 1 [Job (Gullwings)] Forward. Activate it. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Leviathan
card.Text: Select 1 of the 3 following actions. 'Choose 1 Forward. Return it to its owner's hand.' 'Choose 1 action ability. Cancel its effect.' 'During this turn, the Forwards you control don't receive any damage from Summons.'

card.Name: Leila
card.Text: When Leila enters the field, choose 1 [Card Name (Viking)] of cost 3 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field.

card.Name: Hraesvelgr
card.Text: When Hraesvelgr enters the field, select 1 of the 3 following actions. 'Skip your opponent's Attack Phase in their next turn. Remove the top 5 cards of your deck from the game.' 'Choose 1 Character in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.' 'Remove all the cards in your opponent's Break Zone from the game.'

card.Name: Materia
card.Text: Materia can be played onto the field even if you control other Light Characters. You can play 2 or more Light Characters onto the field. When Materia enters the field, you may search for 1 Light Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Spiritus
card.Text: Spiritus can be played onto the field even if you control other Dark Characters. You can play 2 or more Dark Characters onto the field. When Spiritus enters the field, you may search for 1 Dark Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Nidhogg
card.Text: When Nidhogg enters the field, your opponent randomly removes 1 card from his/her hand from the game. When Nidhogg enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Remove it from the game.

card.Name: Auron
card.Text: The [Category (X)] Forwards you control gain Brave. [Dull]: Choose 1 blocking Forward. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Aigis
card.Text: The [Job (Warrior of Light)] Forwards other than Aigis you control gain Brave. When Aigis enters the field, you may play 1 Forward of cost 2 from your hand onto the field.

card.Name: Red Mage
card.Text: When Red Mage enters the field, if the cost paid to play Red Mage included Ice CP, your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand. [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 1000 damage.

card.Name: Fritt
card.Text: Fritt is also a Monster in all situations. When Fritt is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Ifrit)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Ifrit
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage. If Ifrit results from an EX Burst, deal it 8000 damage instead.

card.Name: Varuna
card.Text: When a Forward you control deals damage to your opponent, Varuna also becomes a Forward with 8000 power and Brave. (This effect does not end at the end of the turn. This ability will not trigger if Varuna is a Forward.)

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: [1 Fire CP, dull, put Black Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 4000 damage.

card.Name: Sazh
card.Text: EX Burst: When Sazh enters the field, you may search for 1 Fire Summon and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Samurai
card.Text: When Samurai enters the field, choose 1 Fire Forward. It gains +2000 power and Brave until the end of the turn. [Dull, put Samurai into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Fire Forward. It gains +2000 power and Brave until the end of the turn. You can only use this ability if you have received 5 points of damage or more.

card.Name: Jecht
card.Text: If you have received 4 points of damage or more, the cost required for playing Jecht onto the field is reduced by 4. When Jecht enters the field, if you have at least 2 points of damage more than your opponent, Jecht deals your opponent 1 point of damage.

card.Name: Summoner
card.Text: When Summoner enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If the cost paid to play Summoner included Lightning CP, dull it.

card.Name: Sol
card.Text: If you control a Job (Warrior of Light) Forward other than Sol, Sol gains 2000 power and Haste.

card.Name: Berserker
card.Text: When Berserker deals damage to your opponent or to a Forward, break Berserker.

card.Name: Baugauven
card.Text: When Baugauven enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If the cost to play Baugauven was only paid with Fire CP, deal it 7000 damage. Final Backdraft [S] [2 Fire CP, dull): Choose 1 Forward of any Element except Fire. Deal it 10000 damage.

card.Name: Fang
card.Text: If you control 2 or more [Category (XIII)] Characters, Fang gains First Strike. If you control 4 or more [Category (XIII)] Characters, Fang gains Haste. If you control 6 or more [Category (XIII)] Characters, Fang gains +3000 power.

card.Name: Bomb
card.Text: [Put Bomb into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 3000 damage, and deal 2000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls. [Discard Bomb]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage. You can only use this ability if Bomb is in your hand.

card.Name: Meeth
card.Text: When Meeth enters the field, you may discard 1 card. If you do so, search for 1 Forward of the same cost as the discarded card and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Lann
card.Text: If you control [Card Name (Reynn)], Lann gains +1000 power. When Lann deals damage to your opponent or to a Forward, choose 1 Forward. You may pay [3 Fire CP, 1 CP]. If you do so, deal it damage equal to Lann's power.

card.Name: Latov
card.Text: When Latov enters the field, choose 1 [Card Name (Chelinka)] or [Card Name (Yuri)] in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field.

card.Name: Lulu
card.Text: When Lulu enters the field, choose 1 Forward. You may put 1 Backup other than Lulu you control into the Break Zone. If you do so, deal it 7000 damage.

card.Name: Reynn
card.Text: EX Burst: When Reynn enters the field, you may search for 1 [Category (WOFF)] Monster and add it to your hand. The [Category (WOFF)] Monsters you control gain +1000 power.

card.Name: Emperor (FFL)
card.Text: When Emperor (FFL) or a [Category (FFL)] Character enters your field, choose 1 Forward of cost 5 or more opponent controls. Dull it and Freeze it.

card.Name: Eduardo
card.Text: When a [Job (Bard)] Forward you control attacks, your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand.

card.Name: Bard
card.Text: When Bard enters the field, choose up to 2 Forwards opponent controls. Freeze them. [Dull, put Bard into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Dull it and Freeze it.

card.Name: Cu Chaspel
card.Text: The [Card Name (Galdes)] you control gains +1000 power. When Cu Chaspel enters the field, your opponent selects 1 Forward he/she controls. Dull it and Freeze it.

card.Name: Gremlin
card.Text: When your opponent discards a card from his/her hand due to your Summons or abilities, Gremlin also becomes a Forward with 7000 power and 'When Gremlin is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Dull it and Freeze it.' (This effect does not end at the end of the turn. This ability will not trigger if Gremlin is a Forward.)

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: When Black Mage enters the field, if the cost paid to play Black Mage included Water CP, draw 2 cards. Then, discard 1 card from your hand.

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: [1 Ice CP, dull]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 2000 damage.

card.Name: Kefka
card.Text: When Kefka enters the field, if the cost to play Kefka was only paid with Ice CP, your opponent may discard 2 cards. If he/she doesn't, Freeze all the Forwards opponent controls. When Kefka enters the field, if the cost to play Kefka was paid with CP of exactly 3 different Elements, choose up to 1 Forward, up to 1 Backup and up to 1 Monster. Dull them and Freeze them.

card.Name: Goblin
card.Text: [Put Goblin into the Break Zone]: Search for 1 Monster and add it to your hand. [Discard Goblin]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 3000 damage. You can only use this ability if Goblin is in your hand.

card.Name: Shiva
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose up to 2 Forwards opponent controls. Freeze them. If Shiva results from an EX Burst, dull them and Freeze them instead.

card.Name: Jihl Nabaat
card.Text: When Jihl Nabaat enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions: 'For each [Job (PSICOM)] you control, your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand.' 'Deal 4000 damage to all the dull Forwards opponent controls.'

card.Name: Snow
card.Text: When a Forward you control attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Dull it.

card.Name: Sephiroth
card.Text: When Sephiroth enters the field, your opponent discards 2 cards from his/her hand. When Sephiroth attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If your opponent has no cards in his/her hand, dull it and Freeze it. Shadow Flare [S] [1 Ice CP]: Your opponent discards 2 cards from his/her hand. You can only use this ability during your Main Phase.

card.Name: Serah
card.Text: When Serah enters the field, choose as many Characters as the [Category (XIII)] Characters you control. Dull them. [Dull 2 active [Category (XIII)] Characters]: Choose 1 Forward. Freeze it.

card.Name: Terra
card.Text: When you cast a Summon, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Dull it.

card.Name: Time Mage
card.Text: When Time Mage enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Dull it and Freeze it.

card.Name: Bablizz
card.Text: Bablizz is also a Monster in all situations. When Bablizz is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Shiva)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Mystic Knight
card.Text: When Mystic Knight enters the field, choose up to 2 Backups. If the cost to play Mystic Knight included Wind CP, activate them. The cost required to cast Ice Summons is reduced by 1 (it cannot become 0).

card.Name: Yunalesca
card.Text: When Yunalesca enters the field or attacks, choose 1 Forward. You may discard 1 Summon from your hand. If you do so, dull it and Freeze it.

card.Name: Yeul
card.Text: [1 Ice CP, dull, put Yeul into the Break Zone]: Search for 1 Forward and put it under the top card of your deck.

card.Name: Lasswell
card.Text: When Lasswell enters the field, choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 5000 damage. If you control 5 or more Ice Characters, deal it 7000 damage instead.

card.Name: Aleria
card.Text: EX Burst: When Aleria enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Chelinka)] or [Card Name (Yuri)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Alhanalem
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage. You can only use this ability if you control [Card Name (Chelinka)] or [Card Name (Yuri)]. [Dull]: Deal 2000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls. You can only use this ability if you control [Card Name (Chelinka)] and [Card Name (Yuri)].

card.Name: Alexander
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward of cost 5 or more opponent controls. Return it to its owner's hand. If Alexander results from an EX Burst, break it instead.

card.Name: Vata
card.Text: When Vata enters the field, if the cost to play Vata was only paid with Wind CP, activate all the Wind Backups you control.

card.Name: Dancer
card.Text: [Dull]: Deal 1000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Ranger
card.Text: When Ranger enters the field, choose 1 Monster of cost 3 or less opponent controls. If the cost paid to play Ranger includes Earth CP, break it. When Ranger attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 2000 damage.

card.Name: Kelger
card.Text: When Kelger enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Play 1 [Job (Dawn Warrior)] among them to the field and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.Name: Condor
card.Text: When a Backup enters your field, if you control 5 or more Backups, Condor also becomes a Forward with 8000 power and 'When Condor attacks, activate all the Wind Characters other than Condor you control.' (This effect does not end at the end of the turn. This ability will not trigger if Condor is a Forward.)

card.Name: Cactuar Conductor
card.Text: When Cactuar Conductor enters the field, choose 1 Forward. During this turn, the next damage dealt to it becomes 0 instead. [2 Wind CP, dull, put Cactuar Conductor into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. During this turn, the next damage dealt to it becomes 0 instead.

card.Name: Thief
card.Text: [2 Wind CP, dull, put Thief into the Break Zone]: Your opponent puts the top 2 cards of his/her deck into the Break Zone. If both cards of are the same Element, draw 1 card.

card.Name: Zu
card.Text: [Put Zu into the Break Zone]: Activate all the Backups you control. [Discard Zu]: Choose up to 2 Backups you control. Activate them. You can only use this ability if Zu is in your hand.

card.Name: Chelinka
card.Text: If a [Category (FFCC)] Character you control deals damage to a Forward, the damage increases by 1000 instead. When Chelinka enters the field, deal 1000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls. When Chelinka forms a party with [Card Name (Yuri)] and attacks, choose 1 Forward or Monster. Break it.

card.Name: Chocobo
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward other than Chocobo. It gains +3000 power until the end of the turn. When that Forward leaves the field this turn, put Chocobo into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Dorgann
card.Text: When a Backup enters your field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Remove it from the game for as long as Dorgann is on the field.

card.Name: Gnash
card.Text: EX Burst: When Gnash enters the field, choose 1 Forward of cost 1 opponent controls or 1 Monster of cost 2 or less opponent controls. Break them.

card.Name: Ninja
card.Text: When Ninja enters the field, choose 1 Forward. If the cost paid to play Ninja included Fire CP, deal it 4000 damage.

card.Name: Bartz
card.Text: When Bartz enters the field, choose up to 2 [Category (V)] Characters. Activate them. Spellblade [S]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 5000 damage. Dual-Wield [S]: Until the end of the turn, Bartz gains First Strike and Bartz's power becomes 10000. Rapid Fire [S]: Until the end of the turn, Bartz gains Haste, Braze and 'Bartz can attack 3 times this turn.' You can only use this ability if Bartz used Spellblade and Dual-Wield this turn.

card.Name: Bartholomew
card.Text: When Bartholomew enters the field, you may play 1 [Card Name (Hope)] from your hand onto the field. [2 Wind CP, dull, put Bartholomew into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Activate it. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Wind Drake
card.Text: EX Burst: When Wind Drake enters the field, choose 1 Forward. It cannot attack until the end of your opponent's turn./

card.Name: Hope
card.Text: If you control a [Job (Father)] and a [Job (Mother)], Hope gains +2000 power and 'Hope cannot be chosen by your opponent's abilities'.

card.Name: Rem
card.Text: EX Burst: When Rem enters the field, you may discard 1 card. If you do so, search for 1 [Job (Class Zero Cadet)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Asmodai
card.Text: When Asmodai enters the field, choose 1 dull Forward opponent controls. If the cost to play Asmodai was only paid with Earth CP, break it.

card.Name: Vanille
card.Text: When Vanille enters the field, choose 1 dull Forward. Select 1 number and reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is of the same cost as the selected number, break it. Poisonga [S] [1 Earth CP, dull]: At the end of this turn, dull all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Carbuncle
card.Text: Back Attack

card.Name: Galuf
card.Text: Galuf cannot be broken during your turn. When Galuf attacks, choose 1 Forward. You may pay [2 Earth CP]. If you do so, it must block Galuf this turn if possible. Stop [S]: Choose up to 2 Forwards. They cannot attack this turn.

card.Name: Krile
card.Text: The cost required to cast your Summons can be paid with CP of any Element. When you cast a Summon, choose 1 Forward. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn. [Discard 1 Summon]: Until the end of the turn, Krile cannot be chosen by your opponent's abilities.

card.Name: Kolka
card.Text: When Kolka enters the field, you may search for 1 Earth Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Zaghnal
card.Text: When a Character of cost 6 or more enters your field, Zaghnal becomes a Forward with 9000 power. (This effect does not end at the end of the turn. This ability will not trigger if Zaghnal becomes a Forward.)

card.Name: Shantotto
card.Text: [1 CP]: Name 1 Element other than Light and Dark. Shantotto becomes the named Element until the end of the turn. You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Summoner
card.Text: When Summoner enters the field, choose 1 Forward. If the cost to play Summoner included Ice CP, Freeze it.

card.Name: Xezat
card.Text: [2 Earth CP]: Xezat gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. [1 Earth CP, 1 Ice CP]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 4000 damage. [1 Earth CP, 1 Wind CP]: Choose 1 Forward. Activate it. [1 Earth CP, 1 Lightning CP]: Choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 4000 damage.

card.Name: Tama
card.Text: [1 Earth CP, dull, put Tama into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 [Category (WOFF)] card in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Tilika
card.Text: You can discard Light and Dark Element cards from your hand to produce CP. (Light cards produce 2 Light CP each and Dark cards produce 2 Dark CP each.)

card.Name: Necromancer
card.Text: [3 Earth CP, 1 CP, dull, put Necromancer into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 [Job (Standard Unit)] in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field.

card.Name: Noctis
card.Text: EX Burst: When you receive damage, choose up to 1 Forward. If you have received 6 points of damage, break it. When you receive damage, choose up to 1 Forward opponent controls. Noctis and the chosen Forward deal damage equal to their respective power to the other. [2 Earth CP, 2 CP]: During this turn, the next damage dealt to Noctis becomes 0 instead.

card.Name: Bahamutian Soldier
card.Text: If you control a Monster, Bahamutian Soldier gains +2000 power.

card.Name: Geomancer
card.Text: [1 Earth CP, dull, put Geomancer into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Prishe
card.Text: The cost required to play Prishe onto the field is reduced by 1 for each [Card Name (Prishe)] in your Break Zone. When Prishe enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it damage equal to Prishe's power.

card.Name: Flan
card.Text: [Put Flan into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. If your opponent doesn't pay [1 CP], it cannot attack or block this turn. [Discard Flan]: Choose 1 blocking Forward. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn. You can only use this ability if Flan is in your hand.

card.Name: Moogle (FFCC)]
card.Text: The [Job (Moogle)] Backups you control can produce CP of any Element.

card.Name: Monk
card.Text: When Monk enters the field, choose 1 damaged Forward. If the cost to pay Monk included Lightning CP, deal it 5000 damage.

card.Name: Yojimbo
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward you control and 1 Forward opponent controls. The first gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. Then, each Forward deals damage equal to its power to the other. If Yojimbo results from an EX Burst, the former gains +3000 power until the end of the turn instead. Then, each Forward deals damage equal to its power to the other.

card.Name: Red Mage
card.Text: When Red Mage enters the field, choose 1 Forward of cost 3 or less opponent controls. If the cost paid to play Red Mage included Water CP, return it to its owner's hand. [2 Lightning CP, dull, put Red Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward of cost 4 or less. Break it.

card.Name: Argy
card.Text: When Argy is put from the field into the Break Zone, select 1 of the 3 following abilities: 'Choose 1 Forward. It gains Haste until the end of the turn.' 'Choose 1 Forward. Activate it.' 'Choose 1 Backup of cost 1 in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field.'

card.Name: Exdeath
card.Text: When Exdeath enters the field, choose 1 Forward from either player's Break Zone. If its cost is equal to or les than the number of Backups you control, play it onto your field.

card.Name: Gilgamesh
card.Text: For each [Card Name (Gilgamesh)] in your Break Zone, Gilgamesh gains +1000 power. If Gilgamesh has 10000 power or more, Gilgamesh gains Brave and can attack twice in the same turn. When Gilgamesh is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may pay [X CP]. If you do so, search for 1 [Card Name (Gilgamesh)] of cost X and play it onto the field dull.

card.Name: Coeurl
card.Text: [Put Coeurl into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains +3000 power, Haste, First Strike and Brave. [Discard Coeurl]: Choose 1 Monster of cost 1. Break it. You can only use this ability if Coeurl is in your hand.

card.Name: Gladiator
card.Text: When your opponent casts a Summon, Gladiator gains +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: The Emperor
card.Text: When The Emperor enters the field, choose 2 Forwards opponent controls. Dull them. During your turn, when a Forward opponent controls becomes dull, choose 1 active Forward opponent controls. Deal it 3000 damage.

card.Name: Thancred
card.Text: When Thancred enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Dull it. When Thancred enters the field, until the end of the turn, if the CP paid to play Thancred was only produced by [Category (XIV)] Backups, Thancred gains +2000 power, Haste and First Strike.

card.Name: Zapt
card.Text: Zapt is also a Monster in all situations. When Zapt is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Ramuh)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Seymour
card.Text: EX Burst: When Seymour enters the field, search for 1 Summon and put it on top of your deck. Lance of Atrophy [S] [2 Lightning CP]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Summon, you may cast it without paying the cost.

card.Name: Cid Previa
card.Text: When Cid Previa enters the field, choose 1 Lightning Backup of cost 3 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field. [1 Lightning CP, dull, put Cid Previa into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage.

card.Name: Noel
card.Text: Haste When Noel enters the field, until the end of the turn, Noel gains +3000 power and 'When Noel deals damage to your opponent, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it'.

card.Name: Barbara
card.Text: The [Job (Dragoon)] and [Card Name (Dragoon)] you control gain Haste. [1 CP]: Choose 1 [Job (Dragoon)] or [Card Name (Dragoon)] other than Barbara. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Flanborg
card.Text: When a Forward of cost 3 or less opponent controls is put from the field into the Break Zone, Flanborg becomes a Forward with 7000 power and 'If Flanborg is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may search for 1 [Job (Militarised Flan)] and add it to your hand'. (This effect does not end at the end of the turn. This ability will not trigger if Flanborg is a Forward.)

card.Name: Cannoneer
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP, dull, put Cannoneer and 1 Forward into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage.

card.Name: Mystic Knight
card.Text: [2 Lightning CP, dull, put Mystic Knight into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 damaged Forward. Break it.

card.Name: Mid Previa
card.Text: When Mid Previa enters the field, choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 3000 damage. When Mid Previa enters the field from the Break Zone, choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 6000 damage. [Discard 3 cards]: Play Mid Previa onto the field. You can only use this ability during your Main Phase and if Mid Previa is in the Break Zone.

card.Name: Lightning
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Category (XIII)] Forward you control. It gains Haste until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Ramuh
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward. It loses 7000 power until the end of the turn. If Ramuh results from an EX Burst, it loses 8000 power until the end of the turn instead.

card.Name: Ramza
card.Text: If Ramza has 4000 power or more, Ramza gains Haste. If Ramza has 6000 power or more, Ramza gains Brave. If Ramza has 8000 power or more, Ramza gains First Strike. [1 Lightning CP]: Ramza gains +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Dragoon
card.Text: When Dragoon enters the field, choose 1 Forward. If the cost paid to play Dragoon included Wind CP, it cannot be blocked this turn.

card.Name: Agrias
card.Text: If you control 7 or more Characters, Agrias gains +2000 power. When Agrias enters the field, turn over one card at a time from the top of your deck until a Character of cost 3 or less is revealed. Play it onto the field. Then, shuffle the other cards revealed and return them to the bottom of your deck.

card.Name: Gawain
card.Text: Gawain doesn’t receive any damage from Forwards' abilities.

card.Name: Kimahri
card.Text: The cost required to play Kimahri onto the field is reduced by 1 for each [Job (Guardian)] you control. The [Job (Guardian)] other than Kimahri you control cannot be chosen by your opponent's abilities. The [Category (X)] Characters other than Kimahri you control cannot be chosen by your opponent's Summons.

card.Name: Chemist
card.Text: [2 Water CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Activate it.

card.Name: Sahagin
card.Text: [Put Sahagin into the Break Zone]: Choose up to 2 Forwards you control. Activate them. They gain +1000 power until the end of the turn. [Discard Sahagin]: Choose 1 Forward of cost 1. Return it to its owner's hand. You can only use this ability if Sahagin is in your hand.

card.Name: Geosgaeno
card.Text: When a Forward opponent controls returns to its owner's hand from the field, Geosgaeno becomes a Forward with 7000 power and 'If Geosgaeno receives damage, the damage is reduced by 1000 instead'. (This effect does not end at the end of the turn. This ability will not trigger if Geosgaeno is a Forward.)

card.Name: White Mage
card.Text: When White Mage enters the field, choose up to 2 Forwards you control. Activate them.

card.Name: Styx
card.Text: When Styx enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If the cost to play Styx was only paid with Water CP, return it to its owner's hand. Undine Cry [S] [2 Water CP, dull]: Until the end of the turn, all the Forwards opponent controls lose 5000 power. You can only use this ability if you have received 5 points of damage or more.

card.Name: Sarah (FFL)
card.Text: When Sarah (FFL) enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Warrior of Light)] Forward of cost 4 or less other than Light or Dark and play it onto the field.

card.Name: Dusk
card.Text: When Dusk enters the field, if you control a [Job (Warrior of Light)] Forward other than Dusk, draw 1 card. [Dull]: During this turn, the cost required your next Summon is reduced by 1. (It cannot become 0.)

card.Name: Tidus
card.Text: Back Attack You can only pay with CP produced by Water Backups to play Tidus from your hand onto the field. When Tidus enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following abilities: 'Activate all Water Forwards.' 'Choose 1 Water Forward. It gains +3000 power until the end of the turn.'

card.Name: Tidus
card.Text: When Tidus enters the field, choose 1 Character you control. Return it to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Ninja
card.Text: When Ninja enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If the cost paid to play Ninja included Fire CP, it cannot block this turn. [1 Water CP, dull]: Return Ninja to your hand.

card.Name: Halicarnassus
card.Text: When Halicarnassus enters the field, all the Forwards opponent controls lose their abilities until the end of the turn. [Dull, discard 2 Summons]: Choose 1 Forward. Break it.

card.Name: Faris
card.Text: If you control a [Card Name (Lenna)] Forward, Faris gains +2000 power. When Faris enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 [Category (V)] Character among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.Name: Braska
card.Text: The cost required to play your [Job (Summoner)] onto the field is reduced by 1 (it cannot become 0).

card.Name: Mime
card.Text: When Mime enters the field, if the cost paid to play Mime included Earth CP, all the Forwards you control gain +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Yaag Rosch
card.Text: When Yaag Rosch enters the field, choose 1 Backup other than Yaag Rosch you control. Return it to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Oracle
card.Text: When Oracle enters the field, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Return these to the top and/or bottom of your deck in any order.

card.Name: Leviathan
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward of cost 4 or less. Return it to its owner's hand. If Leviathan results from an EX Burst: return it to its owner's hand and draw 1 card intead.

card.Name: Wakka
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Category (X)] Forward you control. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Yuna
card.Text: [0 CP]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Summon, you may pay the cost and cast it. You can only use this ability once per turn. [1 CP, remove 3 Summons in the Break Zone from the game]: Add Yuna to your hand. You can only use this ability during your Main Phase and if Yuna is in the Break Zone.

card.Name: Yuri
card.Text: Yuri has all the Elements except Dark. [Dull a total of three active Backups of the same Element or 2 Backups of the same Element and Yuri]: Choose 1 of the 4 following effects: 'Draw 1 card.' 'Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 4000 damage.' 'Choose 1 Forward. Dull it and Freeze it.' 'Choose 1 Forward. It loses all its abilities until the end of the turn.'

card.Name: Galdes
card.Text: When Galdes is put from the field into the Break Zone, select 1 of the 3 following abilities: 'Your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand.' 'Choose 1 Monster in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.' 'Choose 1 Forward. It loses 5000 power until the end of the turn.'

card.Name: Sin
card.Text: When Sin enters the field, break all the Forwards and Monsters other than Sin. Sin deals you 1 point of damage. Giga-Graviton [S] [9 CP]: At the end of your next turn, if Sin is on the field, your opponent loses the game. You can only use this ability during your turn.

card.Name: Warrior of Light
card.Text: If you control 4 or more Forwards, Warrior of Light gains Haste. When Warrior of Light enters the field, all the Forwards you control gain +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Firion
card.Text: EX Burst: When Firion enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 2000 damage for each Forward you control (up to 3 Forwards).

card.Name: Ultimecia
card.Text: When Ultimecia enters the field, select 1 of the 3 following abilities: 'Choose up to 2 Characters opponent controls. Dull them.' 'Freeze all the Forwards opponent controls.' 'Freeze all the Backups opponent controls.'

card.Name: The Emperor
card.Text: EX Burst: When The Emperor enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If you have received 4 points of damage or more, dull it and Freeze it. [1 Ice CP, dull, discard 2 cards]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Break it. You can only use this ability during your turn.

card.Name: Cecil
card.Text: EX Burst: When Cecil enters the field, choose up to 2 Characters. Activate them. If you have received 5 points of damage or more, Cecil gains +2000 power and 'Cecil cannot be chosen by your opponent's abilities.'

card.Name: Y'shtola
card.Text: When Y'shtola enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 2000 damage. [1 Wind CP, dull, put Y'shtola into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage. You can only use this ability if you control 7 or more Characters.

card.Name: Garland
card.Text: When Garland blocks, Garland gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. When Garland is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Forward. It gains +4000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Golbez
card.Text: The cost required to play Golbez onto the field is reduced by 1 for ever 5 cards in your Break Zone. When Golbez enters the field, choose 1 Forward of cost 5 or less in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Ark Angel HM
card.Text: If Ark Angel HM deals damage to your opponent, double the damage instead. When Ark Angel HM attacks, Ark Angel HM gains +3000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Red Mage
card.Text: When Red Mage enters the field, choose 1 Fire Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains Haste and Brave.

card.Name: Ifrit
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 4000 damage and 1000 more damage for each Fire Backup you control.

card.Name: Iroha
card.Text: If a Fire Character you control deals damage to a Forward, increase the damage by 1000 instead. [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 1000 damage.

card.Name: Edgar
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Category (VI)] Forward you control. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Cloud
card.Text: EX Burst: When Cloud enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 3000 damage and 1000 more damage for each point of damage you have received. When Cloud is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may remove the top 10 cards of your deck from the game. If you do so, return Cloud to the field dull.

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: [2 Fire CP, dull, put Black Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Fire Summon in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Golem
card.Text: When Golem enters the field, choose 1 Forward. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. [Put Golem into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 attacking Forward. It gains +4000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Samurai
card.Text: If you have received 3 points of damage or more, Samurai gains Brave. If you have received 5 points of damage or more, Samurai gains +1000 power.

card.Name: Amarant
card.Text: EX Burst: When Amarant enters the field, select 1 of the following 2 abilities: 'Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 7000 damage.' 'Choose 1 Monster of cost 3 or less opponent controls. Break it.'

card.Name: Cid (FFL)
card.Text: When Cid (FFL) enters the field, choose 1 Forward. Deal it 5000 damage. If you control 5 or more Fire Backups, deal it 8000 damage instead.

card.Name: Zenos
card.Text: If your opponent controls any [Job (Warrior of Light)] Forwards, Zenos gains +2000 power, Haste and Brave. When Zenos deals damage to your opponent, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 5000 damage.

card.Name: Warrior
card.Text: [1 Fire CP]: If Warrior deals damage to a Forward this turn, the damage increases by 2000 instead.

card.Name: Duncan
card.Text: You may use Duncan's special ability by discarding a [Card Name (Sabin)] instead of discarding a [Card Name (Duncan)] as part of the cost. When Duncan enters the field, choose 1 Forward of cost 4 or less. Deal it 4000 damage. Phantom Rush [S] [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it damage equal to Duncan's power.

card.Name: Bahamut
card.Text: You can only pay with CP produced by Backups to cast Bahamut. Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 10000 damage. If it is put from the field into the Break Zone this turn, remove it from the game instead.

card.Name: Vivi
card.Text: When Vivi enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 2000 damage. If you control 4 or more [Category (IX)] Characters, deal it 7000 damage instead. If you control 7 or more [Category (IX)] Characters, deal it 10000 damage instead.

card.Name: Brynhildr
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage.

card.Name: Marche
card.Text: EX Burst: When Marche enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 Fire Character among those to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.Name: Sabin
card.Text: When Sabin attacks, choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage. If you control [Card Name (Edgar)], deal it 4000 damage instead.

card.Name: Yotsuyu
card.Text: [1 Fire CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward of cost 5 or less. It cannot block this turn.

card.Name: Rain
card.Text: When Rain enters the field or attacks, choose 1 Forward. You may pay 1 Fire CP. If you do so, deal it 3000 damage.

card.Name: Lava Spider
card.Text: The attacking Forwards you control gain +3000 power.

card.Name: Ark Angel GK
card.Text: EX Burst: When Ark Angel GK enters the field, freeze all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Umaro
card.Text: Umaro must attack once per turn if possible. When Umaro attacks, if you don't pay 1 Ice CP, discard 1 card from your hand.

card.Name: Imperio
card.Text: When Imperio enters the field, you may pay 1 Ice CP. If you do so, search for 1 Light Forward and add it to your hand. When Imperio is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may search for 1 Dark Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Garland (IX)
card.Text: At the beginning of your opponent's Main Phase 1, your opponent selects 1 active Character he/she controls and dulls it. At the beginning of your Main Phase 1, choose 1 Character. You may pay 1 Ice CP. If you do so, freeze it.

card.Name: Scholar
card.Text: [Dull, put Scholar into the Break Zone]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Ice card, add it to your hand.

card.Name: The Mask
card.Text: When The Mask enters the field, you may search for 1 [Category (FFL)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Bard
card.Text: [Dull, put Bard into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Freeze it.

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: [2 Ice CP, 3 CP, dull, put Black Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 9000 damage.

card.Name: Cocytus
card.Text: EX Burst: When Cocytus enters the field, choose up to 2 Forwards. If you control 4 or more Ice Characters, freeze them. When Cocytus enters the field, choose 1 Forward. Dull it.

card.Name: Shiva
card.Text: You can only cast Shiva during your turn. Choose up to 3 Forwards or Monsters opponent controls. Dull them and Freeze them.

card.Name: Shiva
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 5000 damage and 1000 more damage for each Ice Backup you control.

card.Name: Scale Toad
card.Text: At the end of your opponent's turn, if your opponent has 2 cards or more in his/her hand, your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand.

card.Name: Squall
card.Text: When Squall enters the field, if your opponent controls any dull Forwards, your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand. [2 Ice CP, 1 CP]: Choose 1 Forward. Dull it. You can only use this ability if you have no cards in your hand.

card.Name: Setzer
card.Text: When Setzer enters the field, choose 1 [Category (VI)] Forward in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Celes
card.Text: When Celes attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If you control 3 or more [Category (VI)] Characters, dull it. When Celes deals damage to your opponent, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Freeze it.

card.Name: Sophia
card.Text: [Dull, put Sophia into the Break Zone]: Dull all the Forwards with Haste, First Strike or Brave opponent controls.

card.Name: Time Mage
card.Text: When Time Mage enters the field, you may discard 1 card from your hand. If you do so, dull and freeze all the Forwards of the same cost as the discarded card opponent controls.

card.Name: Mateus, the Corrupt
card.Text: EX Burst: Your opponent puts 1 attacking Forward he/she controls into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Palom
card.Text: When Palom enters the field, select 1 of the 3 following actions. 'Each player discards 1 card from his/her hand.' 'Choose 1 Forward. Freeze it.' 'Dull all the Backups opponent controls.'

card.Name: Dark Fina
card.Text: When Dark Fina enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions. If you have received 5 points of damage or more, select up to 2 of the 2 following actions instead. 'Search for 1 Summon and add it to your hand.' 'Cast 1 Summon of cost 7 or less from your hand without paying the cost.'

card.Name: Lasswell
card.Text: When Lasswell enters the field or attacks, choose 1 Forward. If it has received damage this turn, dull it and freeze it. [1 Fire CP]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 1000 damage. Azure Sky [S] [1 Fire CP, 1 Ice CP, dull]: Choose 2 Forwards. Deal 8000 damage to the first Forward and dull and freeze the other.

card.Name: Lancer Unit
card.Text: When Lancer Unit enters the field, choose 1 Forward. Dull it and freeze it. [Put Lancer Unit into the Break Zone]: Your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand. You can only use this ability during your turn.

card.Name: Ark Angel MR
card.Text: Ark Angel MR cannot be blocked by a Forward of power 7000 or more. [2 Wind CP]: Ark Angel MR cannot be chosen by your opponent's Summons or abilities this turn.

card.Name: Alexander
card.Text: Choose 1 Character of cost 4 or more. Break it.

card.Name: Waltrill
card.Text: When Waltrill enters the field, place up to 2 cards from your hand at the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, draw the same number of cards as were returned to your deck. [Dull, put Waltrill into the Break Zone]: Draw 1 card, then place 1 card from your hand at the bottom of your deck. You can only use this ability if you control [Card Name (Norschtalen)].

card.Name: Warrior of Light
card.Text: When a [Job (Standard Unit)] Forward enters your field, choose up to 2 Backups. Activate them. When Warrior of Light attacks, all the [Job (Standard Unit)] Forwards you control gain +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Aerith
card.Text: The Forwards you control don't receive damage that is less than their power. If Aerith is dealt damage by a Summon or an ability, reduce the damage by 2000 instead. When Aerith is put from the field into the Break Zone, activate all the Backups you control.

card.Name: Onion Knight
card.Text: EX Burst: When Onion Knight enters the field, choose up to 2 Backups you control. If you have received 3 points of damage or more, activate them. If you have received 5 points of damage or more, activate all the Backups you control instead.

card.Name: Garuda
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage and 1000 more damage for each Wind Character you control.

card.Name: Thief
card.Text: When Thief enters the field, name 1 Element. Your opponent randomly reveals 2 cards from his/her hand. Select 1 card of the same Element as named among them. Your opponent discards this card.

card.Name: Sherlotta
card.Text: If you pay a CP, you may put Sherlotta into the Break Zone to produce 1 CP of any Element. (You can dull Sherlotta to pay the CP.)

card.Name: Cid Highwind
card.Text: When Cid Highwind enters the field, choose 1 Backup of cost 3 or more opponent controls. Return it to its owner's hand. Big Brawl [S] [Dull]: Choose 1 Character opponent controls. Return it to its opponent's hand.

card.Name: Selkie
card.Text: When Selkie is put from the field into the Break Zone, your opponent puts the top 2 cards of his/her deck into the Break Zone. If both cards are of the same type, draw 1 card.

card.Name: Deathgaze (IX)
card.Text: When Deathgaze (IX) enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Remove it from the game for as long as Deathgaze (IX) is on the field.

card.Name: Ninja
card.Text: [2 Wind CP, dull, put Ninja into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Backup of cost 3 or less. Break it.

card.Name: Norschtalen
card.Text: When Norschtalen enters the field, you may search for 1 [Category (FFCC)] Backup and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Basilisk
card.Text: When Basilisk enters the field, choose 1 Forward. Deal it 4000 damage. [Put Basilisk into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 damaged Forward. Break it.

card.Name: Fina
card.Text: If you pay the cost to pay Fina onto the field, you may pay an extra 3 Wind CP. When Fina enters the field, select 1 of the following 2 actions. If you paid the extra cost, select 2 of the 2 following actions instead. 'Deal 5000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.' 'Activate all the Characters you control.'

card.Name: Fina
card.Text: When Fina enters the field, choose 1 Wind Character you control. Activate it. When Fina is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Character you control. Activate it.

card.Name: Veriaulde
card.Text: When Veriaulde is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Wind Monster of cost 4 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field.

card.Name: Matoya
card.Text: EX Burst: When Matoya enters the field, choose 1 Monster opponent controls. Break it.

card.Name: Yuffie
card.Text: If you control 3 or more [Category (VII)] Characters other than Yuffie, Yuffie gains +2000 power and Haste. When Yuffie attacks, deal 1000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Archer
card.Text: [2 Wind CP, dull, put Archer into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 10000 damage.

card.Name: Chaos, Walker of the Wheel
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it. If that Forward is put into the Break Zone, your opponent may play 1 Forward from their hand onto the field.

card.Name: Ark Angel TT
card.Text: When Ark Angel TT enters the field, choose 1 dull Forward opponent controls. At the end of your opponent's next turn, break it.

card.Name: Ardyn
card.Text: Brave Ardyn cannot be broken. At the beginning of your opponent's Attack Phase, your opponent selects 1 Character he/she controls. He/she may put it into the Break Zone. If he/she does, Ardyn cannot block this turn.

card.Name: Apururu
card.Text: The cost required to play Apururu onto the field is reduced by 1 for each Backup you control. When Apururu enters the field, choose 1 Character in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Dark Knight
card.Text: [1 Earth CP, 1 CP, dull, put Dark Knight into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains +1000 power for each point of damage you have received.

card.Name: Undead Princess
card.Text: When Undead Princess enters the field, choose 1 Forward. If your opponent doesn't pay 3 CP, it cannot attack or block this turn. [Put 2 Earth Backups into the Break Zone]: Play Undead Princess onto the field dull. You can only use this ability if Undead Princess is in the Break Zone.

card.Name: Ignis
card.Text: EX Burst: When Ignis enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Noctis)] and add it to your hand. The [Category (XV)] Forwards other than Ignis you control gain +1000 power and Brave. Overwhelm [S] [1 Earth CP]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 4000 damage for each [Category (XV)] Forward you control.

card.Name: Machinist
card.Text: When Machinist enters the field, choose 1 dull Forward. Break it.

card.Name: Gladiolus
card.Text: You can only pay with Earth CP to play Gladiolus onto the field. If you control [Card Name (Noctis)], the cost for playing Gladiolus onto the field is reduced by 2. Cyclone [S] [2 Earth CP, 2 CP, dull]: Deal 7000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Graham
card.Text: When Graham is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If you have received 4 points of damage or more, break it.

card.Name: Glaive
card.Text: EX Burst: When Glaive enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Sol)] or [Card Name (Diana)] and add it to your hand. The [Category (FFL)] Forwards other than Glaive you control gain +2000 power.

card.Name: Titan
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains +1000 power for each Earth Backup you control.

card.Name: Nacht
card.Text: If you control a [Job (Warrior of Darkness)] other than Nacht, Nacht gains +1000 power and Brave. [X CP, X CP]: Choose 1 Forward or Monster. If the cost is X, break it. You can only use this ability during your turn and only once per turn. Ebony Slash [S] [2 Earth CP]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 8000 damage.

card.Name: Noctis
card.Text: EX Burst: When Noctis enters the field, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Add 1 [Category (XV)] card among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order. Warp-strike [S] [1 Earth CP]: Choose 1 Monster. Break it.

card.Name: Luminous Puma
card.Text: When Luminous Puma enters the field, choose 1 Forward in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand. [Put Luminous Puma into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward or Backup in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Fenrir
card.Text: If you cast Fenrir, you may pay an extra 2 CP. Choose 1 Light Forward or Dark Forward. Break it. If you paid the extra cost, remove it from the game instead.

card.Name: Prompto
card.Text: EX Burst: When Prompto enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If your opponent controls 4 or more Forwards, remove it from the game. When Prompto enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it.

card.Name: Hecatoncheir
card.Text: Choose 1 Backup of cost 3 or more. Break it.

card.Name: Libroarian
card.Text: When Libroarian enters the field, remove the top 4 cards of your deck from the game. At the end of your turn, add 1 card removed by the previous effect to your hand. Then, if there are no more cards removed by the previous effect, put Liborarian into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Marlene
card.Text: EX Burst: When Marlene enters the field, choose 1 [Card Name (Aerith)] or [Card Name (Cloud)] or [Card Name (Tifa)] or [Card Name (Barret)] in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Moogle Knight
card.Text: Brave If Moogle Knight is dealt damage by a Forward, reduce the damage by 3000 instead. If a Forward forming a party with Moogle Knight receives damage, reduce the damage by 3000 instead.

card.Name: Monk
card.Text: [Dull, put Monk into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains +3000 power and Brave. You can only use this ability during your Main Phase.

card.Name: Layle
card.Text: [Dull, put Layle into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Summon of cost 4 or less. Cancel its effect.

card.Name: Ark Angel EV

Kick [S] [1 Earth CP, 1 CP, dull]: Deal damage equal to half of Yang's power to all the Forwards opponent controls (round up to the nearest 1000).

card.Name: Rydia
card.Text: When Rydia enters the field, you may search for 1 Summon and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Arecia Al-Rashia
card.Text: When Arecia Al-Rashia enters the field, you may search for 1 [Category (TYPE-0)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Angeal
card.Text: When Angeal is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Zack)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Angeal Penance
card.Text: Angeal Penance is also Card Name Angeal in all situations. Haste When Angeal Penance deals damage to your opponent, choose 1 damaged Forward. Break it.

card.Name: Exdeath
card.Text: When Exdeath attacks, all Characters opponent controls lose their Jobs until the end of the turn. Grand Cross [S] [7 Lightning CP]: Remove all Characters on the field other than Exdeath and all cards in the Break Zone from the game.

card.Name: Enuo
card.Text: When a Character is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may remove it from the game instead. [1 CP]: Choose 1 card in the Break Zone. Remove it from the game.

card.Name: Odin
card.Text: Choose 1 Forward. If it has 7000 power or less, break it. If you control a [Job (Class Zero Cadet)] Forward, break it regardless of its power instead.

card.Name: Gilgamesh
card.Text: [1 Fire CP]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage. [1 Wind CP]: Gilgamesh cannot be chosen by Summons during this turn. [1 Earth CP]: Gilgamesh gains +1000 power until the end of the turn. [1 Lightning CP]: Gilgamesh gains Haste until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Queen
card.Text: If you control a [Job (Class Zero Cadet)] other than Queen, Queen gains First Strike. Speedrush [S]: Queen gains Haste and 'Queen cannot be blocked' until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Black Waltz 3
card.Text: EX BURST: When Black Waltz 3 enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Until of the end of turn, it loses 1000 power for each card in your hand.

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: When Black Mage enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If you control 4 or more [Card Name (Black Mage)], it loses 8000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: [2 Lightning CP, 2 CP, dull, put Black Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 active Forward of cost 3 or less. Break it.

card.Name: Kelger
card.Text: Haste When Kelger enters the field, you may play 1 [Job (Dawn Warrior)] from your hand onto the field. Lupine Attack [S]: Kelger gains +6000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Sice
card.Text: When Sice attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Until the end of the turn, it loses 1000 power for each [Job (Class Zero Cadet)] Character you control. Black Hole [S] [1 Lightning CP]: Choose 1 Forward. Until the end of the turn, it loses 4000 power.

card.Name: Zangetsu
card.Text: [1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage. You can only use this ability if you control [Card Name (Edge)]. [1 Lightning CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 4000 damage.

card.Name: Jack
card.Text: Jack cannot block. When Jack attacks, Jack does not activate during your next Active Phase. Reflex [S]: Activate Jack. Jack loses all his abilities until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Exodus, the Judge-Sal
card.Text: Select 1 number. Your opponent selects 1 number. Break all Forwards of cost equal to either number.

card.Name: Nine
card.Text: When Nine attacks, choose 1 Forward you control. Until the end of the turn, it gains +1000 power for each [Job (Class Zero Cadet)] Forward you control. Primal Roar [S] [4 Lightning CP]: All Forwards cannot block this turn.

card.Name: Freya
card.Text: Haste First Strike Cherry Blossom [S] [2 Lightning CP]: For each [Job (Dragoon)] and [Card Name (Dragoon)] you control, deal 2000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Cannoneer
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP, 1 CP, dull, put Cannoneer and 1 Backup other than Cannoneer into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage.

card.Name: Mystic Knight
card.Text: When Mystic Knight is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 4000 damage.

card.Name: Simulacrum of a Hero
card.Text: [1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 1000 damage. [2 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 3000 damage.

card.Name: Lightning
card.Text: EX BURST: When Lightning enters the field, choose 1 [Card Name (Odin)] in your Break Zone. You may put it on top of your deck. Gestalt Drive [S] [1 Lightning CP, 1 CP, dull, discard 1 [Card Name (Odin)]]: Choose up to 2 Forwards of cost 4 or less. Break them.

card.Name: Ramza
card.Text: For each [Category (FFT)] Forward you control other than Ramza, Ramza gains +1000 power. [3 CP]: Choose 1 [Category (FFT)] Forward you control. It gains +1000 power, Haste, and First Strike until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Dragoon
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP]: Dragoon gains Haste until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Blue Mage
card.Text: [2 Water CP, 1 CP, dull, put Blue Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward of cost 5 or higher. Return it to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Artemicion
card.Text: When Artemicion enters the field, place any number of cards from your hand at the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, draw the same number of cards.

card.Name: Famfrit, the Darkening Cloud
card.Text: EX BURST: Both players select 1 Forward they control and put it into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Izayoi
card.Text: When Izayoi enters the field, you may play 1 [Job (Ninja)] or [Card Name (Ninja)] of cost 3 or less from your hand onto the field. Illusions [S] [2 Water CP]: Choose up to 2 Forwards. They cannot attack or block this turn.

card.Name: Ephemeral Summoner
card.Text: When Ephemeral Summoner enters the field, you may search for 1 Water Summon of cost 4 or less and put it on top of your deck.

card.Name: Eiko
card.Text: [2 Water CP, dull, put Eiko into the Break Zone]: Choose 4 Summons in your Break Zone. Add 1 of them to your hand, and remove the rest from the game.

card.Name: Eiko
card.Text: When Eiko enters the field, you may search for 1 [Category (IX)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Dancer
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. It loses all abilities until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Garnet
card.Text: Garnet cannot be chosen by your opponent's Summons. When you cast a Summon, all the Forwards you control gain +1000 power until the end of the turn. [2 Water]: Cast 1 Summon of cost 3 or less from your hand without paying its cost.

card.Name: Cagnazzo
card.Text: If Cagnazzo receives damage during your opponent's turn, reduce the damage by 4000 instead. When Cagnazzo enters the field, until the end of the turn, all the Forwards opponent controls lose 1000 power for every 2 Water Characters you control.

card.Name: Ghido
card.Text: Ghido does not activate during the Active Phase. [1 Water CP]: Activate Ghido. [1 Water CP, 1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward of cost 5 or more opponent controls. Put it on top of its owner's deck.

card.Name: Quacho Queen
card.Text: [1 Water CP, 1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. It gains +1000 power for each Forward you control until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Quina
card.Text: For each card in your hand, Quina gains +1000 power. Eat [S]: Choose 1 Forward opponent controls which has been dealt damage this turn. If that Forward has a special ability or an action ability, break it.

card.Name: Summoner
card.Text: When Summoner enters the field, choose 1 Summon in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Syldra
card.Text: Choose up to 2 Forwards opponent controls. Return them to their owners' hand.

card.Name: White Mage
card.Text: If White Mage or a Forward forming a party with White Mage receives damage, the damage decreases by 3000 instead.

card.Name: Steiner
card.Text: EX BURST: When Steiner enters the field, you may search for 1 [Category (IX)] Character and add it to your hand. If you control a [Category (IX)] Character other than Steiner, Steiner gains +1000 power.

card.Name: Ceodore
card.Text: When one of your Water Characters other than Ceodore enters the field, choose 1 Forward you control. Select 1 from the following. 'It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.' 'It gains First Strike until the end of the turn.' 'It gains Brave until the end of the turn.'

card.Name: Knight
card.Text: For each Backup you control, Knight gains +1000 power.

card.Name: Porom
card.Text: When Porom enters the field, activate all the Forwards you control. Curaga [S]: Choose 1 Forward you control. During this turn, the next damage dealt to it becomes 0 instead.

card.Name: Mog (IX)
card.Text: When Mog (IX) enters the field, if you control [Card Name (Eiko)], draw 1 card. [2 Water CP, 1 CP, dull, put Mog (IX) into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Return it to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Famed Mimic Gogo
card.Text: If your opponent doesn't control Forwards, put Famed Mimic Gogo into the Break Zone. Power Hit [S]: Choose 1 Forward. Put it into the Break Zone. You can only use this ability if Famed Mimic Gogo has received damage this turn.

card.Name: Leonora
card.Text: EX BURST: When Leonora enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Palom)] or [Card Name (Porom)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Lenna
card.Text: When Lenna enters the field, choose 1 Water Forward of cost 2 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field. Arise [S] [4 Water CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward other than Light or Dark in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field. You can only use this ability during your turn.

card.Name: Ultima, the High Seraph
card.Text: If you control a Light Forward, the cost to cast Ultima, The High Seraph is reduced by 2. Remove from the game all the Forwards on the field other than Light and Dark. Then, remove from the top of your deck twice the number of cards removed by the previous effect.

card.Name: Minerva
card.Text: At the beginning of your Main Phase 1, select 1 of the 3 following actions. 'All the Forwards you control gain +3000 power until the end of the turn.' 'All Characters opponent controls lose their abilities until the end of the turn.' 'Draw 1 card.'

card.Name: Zodiark, Keeper of Precepts
card.Text: If you control a Dark Forward, the cost to cast Zodiark, Keeper of Precepts is reduced by 3. Break all the Forwards opponent controls. You receive damage equal to the number of Forwards broken by this effect.

card.Name: Feral Chaos
card.Text: Feral Chaos is also Card name Chaos in all situations. Haste First Strike Brave When Feral Chaos attacks or blocks, select 1 Character you control. Put it into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Vivi
card.Text: [Put Vivi into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 5000 damage. [2 Fire CP, put Vivi into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 8000 damage.

card.Name: Moogle (Class Zero)

card.Name: Queen
card.Text: EX BURST: When Queen enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If you control 2 or more [Job (Class Zero Cadet)] Forwards, dull it. If you control 5 or more [Job (Class Zero Cadet)] Forwards, break it instead.

card.Name: Garnet
card.Text: When Garnet enters the field, you may search for 1 Water Summon with a cost of 2 or less and cast it without paying the cost. If you do not cast it, put the Summon into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Ace
card.Text: When Ace enters the field, you may play 1 [Job (Class Zero Cadet)] Forward from your hand onto the field. When Ace is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 [Job (Class Zero Cadet)] Forward other than [Card Name (Ace)] from your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Zidane
card.Text: If you control a [Category (IX)] Forward, the cost for playing Zidane onto the field is reduced by 1. When Zidane enters the field, select 1 of the following actions. 'Draw 1 card.' 'Your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand.' 'Activate all [Category (IX)] Characters you control.'

card.Name: Hauyn
card.Text: If you control 3 or more [Category (WOFF)] Characters other than Hauyn, Hauyn gains +4000 power. If you control 5 or more [Category (WOFF)] Characters other than Hauyn, Hauyn gains +1000 power and Brave.

card.Name: Red Mage
card.Text: [1 Fire CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. During this turn, the damage dealt to it is increased by 1000 instead.

card.Name: Ifrit
card.Text: EX BURST: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 4000 damage. If you control 5 or more Fire Characters, deal it 7000 damage instead.

card.Name: Garland
card.Text: When Garland enters the field, you may play 1 Fire Backup of cost 3 or less from your hand onto the field dull.

card.Name: Caius

card.Name: Cyan
card.Text: Brave The [Category (VI)] Forwards other than Cyan you control gain Brave. Bushido: Fang [S] [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. At the beginning of your next Main Phase 1, if Cyan is on your field, break it.

card.Name: Scholar
card.Text: [1 Fire CP, dull, put Scholar into the Break Zone]: Choose up to 2 Forwards opponent controls. Deal them 3000 damage.

card.Name: Ranger

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: When Black Mage enters the field, choose up to 2 Forwards. Deal them 5000 damage.

card.Name: Sage
card.Text: [Dull, put Sage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward you control. If it deals damage to a Forward this turn, the damage increases by 2000 instead.

card.Name: Goblin

card.Name: Zack
card.Text: EX BURST: When Zack enters the field, choose 1 [Card Name (Cloud)] or [Job (SOLDIER)] in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Samurai

card.Name: Shadow

card.Name: Bahamut
card.Text: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 8000 damage. If it is put from the field into the Break Zone this turn, remove it from the game instead.

card.Name: Marauder
card.Text: When Marauder attacks, Marauder gains +8000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Bomb
card.Text: [1 Fire CP]; Until the end of the turn, Bomb also becomes a Forward with 5000 power and '[Put Bomb into the Break Zone]: Deal 4000 damage to all Forwards.' You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Bomb
card.Text: [Put Bomb into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 5000 damage.

card.Name: Marche
card.Text: [Dull 1 active Forward]: Choose 1 Forward blocking Marche. Deal it damage equal to the power of the dull Forward.

card.Name: Sabin
card.Text: When Sabin enters the field or attacks, choose 1 Forward you control. It cannot be broken this turn. [1 Fire CP, 1 CP]: Sabin gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. You can only use this ability while Sabin is attacking. Rising Phoenix [S] [2 Fire CP, 2 CP]: Deal 8000 damage to all Forwards. You can only use this ability while Sabin is attacking.

card.Name: Montblanc
card.Text: EX BURST: When Montblanc enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Marche)] and add it to your hand. [1 Fire CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage. You can only use this ability if you control [Card Name (Marche)].

card.Name: General Leo
card.Text: When General Leo attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 2000 damage. Shock [S] [3 CP]: Deal 5000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Llednar

card.Name: Umaro
card.Text: EX BURST: When Umaro enters the field, you may search for 1 Monster and add it to your hand. Umaro must attack once per turn if possible. Bodyslam [S] [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage.

card.Name: Gestahlian Empire Cid
card.Text: When Gestahlian Empire Cid enters the field, you may search for 1 [Category (VI)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Bard
card.Text: [1 Ice CP, dull, put Bard into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Dull it.

card.Name: Bard
card.Text: [2 Ice CP, 2 CP, dull, put Bard into the Break Zone]: Your opponent discards 2 cards from his/her hand. You can only use this ability during your turn.

card.Name: Ghoul
card.Text: [1 Ice CP, 1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Dull it.

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: [Dull, put Black Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 4000 damage.

card.Name: Sage

card.Name: Arithmetician

card.Name: Shiva

card.Name: Cid Randell
card.Text: If you control [Card Name (Remedi)], Cid Randell gains +1000 power. When your opponent's Forward enters the field, if your opponent doesn't pay 1 CP, dull that Forward.

card.Name: Setzer

card.Name: Serah
