card.Name: Rogue
card.Text: When Rogue deals damage to a Forward, dull it and Freeze it.

card.Name: Swampmonk
card.Text: [1 Ice CP]: Until the end of the turn, Swampmonk also becomes a Forward with 5000 power and 'When Swampmonk attacks, choose 1 Forward or Monster. Dull it.' You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Babus
card.Text: When a Forward opponent controls attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If your opponent doesn't pay 1 CP, Freeze it.

card.Name: Flan
card.Text: [1 Ice CP, dull]: Search for 1 [Card Name (Flan)] and add it to your hand. [Dull, put Flan into the Break Zone:] Your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand. You can only use this ability during your turn.

card.Name: Mewt
card.Text: EX BURST: When Mewt enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Cid Randell)] or [Card Name (Remedi)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Mecha Chocobo
card.Text: Mecha Chocobo cannot be chosen by Summons. When Mecha Chocobo attacks, choose 1 dull Forward of cost 4 or less opponent controls. Break it. When Mecha Chocobo is blocked, break Mecha Chocobo.

card.Name: Lich
card.Text: Deal each Forward opponent controls damage equal to half of its power (round up to the nearest 1000).

card.Name: Remedi
card.Text: If you control [Card Name (Cid Randell)], Remedi gains +1000 power. When your opponent plays a Character onto the field other than from his/her hand, if your opponent doesn't pay 2 CP, break it.

card.Name: Locke
card.Text: When Locke enters the field, if you control 2 or more [Category (VI)] Characters other than Locke, your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand. When Locke deals damage to your opponent, your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand. Mirage Dive [S]: Locke cannot be blocked this turn.

card.Name: Ahriman
card.Text: [1 Wind CP, put Ahriman into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Monster of cost 5 or more. Break it. [1 Wind CP, put Ahriman into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward of cost 5 or more. Break it.

card.Name: A-Ruhn-Senna
card.Text: When A-Ruhn-Senna enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Kan-E-Senna)] or [Card Name (Raya-O-Senna)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Alexander
card.Text: EX BURST: Choose 1 Forward of power 9000 or more. Break it.

card.Name: Alexander
card.Text: EX BURST: Select 1 of the 2 following actions. 'Choose 1 Monster. Break it.' 'Choose 1 Backup you control. Activate it. Draw 1 card.'

card.Name: Ezel
card.Text: When your opponent casts a Summon, activate all the Forwards you control.

card.Name: Onion Knight
card.Text: When Onion Knight enters the field or attacks, choose 1 Forward. Deal it 3000 damage. When Onion Knight enters the field, choose 1 [Card Name (Onion Knight)] of any Element except Wind in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand. Job Change: Ninja [S]: Place Onion Knight at the bottom of your deck. If you do so, search for 1 [Card Name (Onion Knight)] with [Job (Sage)] and play it onto the field.

card.Name: Kan-E-Senna
card.Text: If you control [Card Name (Raya-O-Senna)], Kan-E-Senna gains +2000 power. When Kan-E-Senna enters the field, if you control [Card Name (A-Ruhn-Senna)], activate all the Backups you control.

card.Name: Archer
card.Text: When Archer enters the field, deal 1000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls. [1 Wind CP, dull, put Archer into the Break Zone]: Deal 2000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Koboldroid Yin
card.Text: [1 Wind CP]: Until the end of the turn, Koboldroid Yin also becomes a Forward with 3000 power and 'Koboldroid Yin cannot be blocked by Forwards of cost 3 or more.' You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Cactuar
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 1000 damage. [2 Wind CP, dull, put Cactuar into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 10000 damage. Cactuar deals you 1 point of damage. EX Bursts of cards put into the Damage Zone due to this ability cannot be used.

card.Name: Thief
card.Text: When Thief leaves the field, your opponent puts the top card of his/her deck into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Shara
card.Text: EX BURST: When Shara enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 3000 damage. If you control [Card Name (Ritz)], deal it 6000 damage instead.

card.Name: White Mage
card.Text: [1 CP, dull, put White Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Activate it. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Chocobo
card.Text: When Chocobo forms a party and attacks, Chocobo and all the Forwards forming a party with it gain +3000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Chocobo
card.Text: When Chocobo enters the field, choose 1 Forward other than Chocobo. It gains Haste until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Fat Chocobo
card.Text: When Fat Chocobo enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Chocobo)] or [Card Name (Chocobo)] of cost 3 or less and play it onto the field. [Dull]: Choose 1 [Job (Chocobo)] or [Card Name (Chocobo)]. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Doned
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Monster. Dull it or activate it.

card.Name: Nono
card.Text: When a Forward you control attacks, choose 1 Backup you control. Activate it.

card.Name: Geomancer
card.Text: When Geomancer enters the field, choose 1 Wind Character other than Geomancer you control. Activate it.

card.Name: Hope
card.Text: EX BURST: When Hope enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Alexander)] and add it to your hand. [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Activate it.

card.Name: Moogle
card.Text: When Moogle enters the field, draw 1 card. When Moogle is put from the field into the Break Zone, draw 1 card.

card.Name: Archer
card.Text: [1 Wind CP, dull, put Archer into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. During this turn, the next damage it deals to a Forward becomes 0 instead.

card.Name: Raya-O-Senna
card.Text: The [Card Name (A-Ruhn-Senna)] and [Card Name (Kan-E-Senna)] you control cannot be chosen by your opponent's abilities.

card.Name: Ritz
card.Text: Characters you control cannot be returned to their owner's hand by your opponent's Summons or abilities. If you control [Card Name (Shara)], Ritz gains +2000 power.

card.Name: Atomos
card.Text: EX BURST: Select 1 of the 2 following actions. 'Choose 1 dull Forward. Break it.' 'Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 8000 damage.'

card.Name: Dark Knight
card.Text: When Dark Knight enters the field, choose 1 Forward you control. It gains +1000 power for each point of damage you have received until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Vincent
card.Text: EX BURST: When Vincent enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Vincent)] and add it to your hand. Galian Beast [S] [1 Earth CP]: Vincent gains +4000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Wedge
card.Text: When Wedge enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (AVALANCHE Operative)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Pugilist
card.Text: For each [Job (Standard Unit)] Forward other than Pugilist you control, Pugilist gains +2000 power.

card.Name: Black Belt
card.Text: When Black Belt enters the field, choose 1 Forward you control. It gains +5000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: [1 Earth CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. It cannot become dull by your opponent's Summons or abilities this turn.

card.Name: Kefka
card.Text: You can put a total of 3 Forwards or Monsters you control into the Break Zone to play Kefka from your hand onto the field. When Kefka enters the field, choose 1 Forward or Monster opponent controls. Break it.

card.Name: Goblin
card.Text: [Put Goblin into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Jessie
card.Text: The cost required to play [Card Name (Cloud)] or [Card Name (Barret)] onto the field is reduced by 1.

card.Name: Shantotto
card.Text: When Shantotto is dealt damage, deal the same amount of damage to all the Forwards other than Shantotto. If a Forward damaged by this ability is put into the Break Zone this turn, remove it from the game instead. Colossal Shantotto [S] [3 Earth CP, dull]: Deal 5000 damage to all the Forwards.

card.Name: Dadaluma
card.Text: When Dadaluma is chosen by your opponent's Summons or abilities, choose up to 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 4000 damage. When Dadaluma is dealt damage, choose up to 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 4000 damage.

card.Name: Tama
card.Text: When Tama enters the field, choose 1 Earth Forward of cost 5 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field. [6 CP, dull, put Tama into the Break Zone]: choose 1 Earth Forward of cost 5 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field dull. You can only use this ability during your turn.

card.Name: Delita
card.Text: When Delita enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. You may put 1 of your Forwards of the same cost other than Delita into the Break Zone. Cecil deals you 1 point of damage. If the cost of the Forward is equal to or less than the damage you have received, break it.

card.Name: Doga
card.Text: [1 Earth CP, dull, put Doga into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Character you control. It cannot be broken by opposing Summons or abilities that don't deal damage.

card.Name: Flandit
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If your opponent doesn't pay 1 CP, it cannot attack or block this turn.

card.Name: Berserker
card.Text: Berserker cannot block.

card.Name: Hill Gigas
card.Text: When a Character opponent controls uses an action ability, put Hill Gigas into the Break Zone. If you do so, cancel its effect and break that Character.

card.Name: Star Sybil
card.Text: EX Burst: When Star Sybil enters the field, you may search for 1 [Category (XI)] Character other than [Card Name (Star Sybil)] and add it to your hand. [Dull, put Star Sybil into the Break Zone]: Play 1 Forward of cost 6 or less from your hand onto the field. You can only use this ability during your hand.

card.Name: Master Monk
card.Text: [1 Earth CP, 1 CP, dull]: Choose up to 2 Forwards. Deal them and Master Monk 4000 damage.

card.Name: Mog (MOBIUS)
card.Text: [2 Earth CP, dull, put Mog (MOBIUS)] into the Break Zone: Search for 1 Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Momodi
card.Text: [0 CP]: Choose 1 Forward you control. It gains Brave until the end of the turn. You can only use this ability during your Main Phase, and only once per turn.

card.Name: Yang
card.Text: Yang cannot become dull by your opponent's Summons or abilities. If you control 5 or more Earth Characters, Yang gains +1000 power and Brave.

card.Name: Lanista
card.Text: For each point of damage you have received, Lanista gains +1000 power.

card.Name: Red Mage
card.Text: [2 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 1000 damage. If it's active, deal it 2000 damage instead.

card.Name: Assassin
card.Text: Haste When Assassin attacks, choose 1 Forward of cost 2 or less. Dull it.

card.Name: Illua
card.Text: Haste During each turn, when Illua is chosen by your opponent's Summon or ability for the first time in that turn, cancel its effect. Sheol [S]: Activate all the Forwards you control. They gain Haste until the end of the turn. All the Forwards opponent controls lose 2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Odin
card.Text: Select 1 of the following 2 actions. 'Choose 1 Forward of cost 3 or less. Break it.' 'Choose 1 Monster of cost 3 or less. Break it.'

card.Name: Twilight Odin
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP]: Until the end of the turn, Twilight Odin also becomes a Forward with 7000 power and 'When Twilight Odin deals damage to your opponent, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it.' You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Scholar
card.Text: [Dull, put Scholar into the Break Zone]: Choose up to 2 active Forwards opponent controls. Deal them 3000 damage.

card.Name: Cid of Clan Gully
card.Text: When Cid of Clan Gully enters the field, you may search for 1 [Category (FFTA2)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Khalia Chival
card.Text: When Khalia Chival enters the field, you may searcfh for 1 [Job (Agito Cadet)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Quon
card.Text: When Quon enters the field, you may cast 1 Summon of cost 2 or less from your hand without paying its cost.

card.Name: Black Knight
card.Text: When a Forward of your opponent of cost 4 or less enters the field, put Black Knight into the Break Zone. If you do so, break it.

card.Name: Thancred
card.Text: If you control a [Job (Scion of the Seventh Dawn)] other than Thancred, Thancred gains +1000 power. If Thancred receives damage while dull, the damage is reduced by 2000 instead.

card.Name: Zemus
card.Text: [X CP, dull]: Choose 1 Lightning Forward in your Break Zone. If its cost is X, play it onto the field. You can only use this ability during your Main Phase.

card.Name: Destin
card.Text: The cost required to play [Card Name (Claidie)] or [Card Name (Trion)] or [Card Name (Pieuje)] onto the field is reduced by 1 (it cannot become 0).

card.Name: Bunkerbeast
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 blocking Forward. It loses 2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Trion
card.Text: The [Job (Knight)] other than Trion you control gain +1000 power.

card.Name: Naghi
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward blocking a [Job (Class Zero Cadet)]. It loses 1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Ravager
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP, dull]: Choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 4000 damage.

card.Name: Cannoneer
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP, dull, put Cannoneer into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 blocking Forward. It loses 3000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Dark Knight
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP]: Deal 1000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls and 2000 damage to Dark Knight.

card.Name: Lightning
card.Text: Haste At the end of the turn, return Lightning to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Ramuh
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 damaged Forward. Deal it 7000 damage.

card.Name: Ramza
card.Text: The cost required to play Ramza onto the field is reduced by 1 for each Forward you control (it cannot become 0). For each Forward other than Ramza you control, Ramza gains +1000 power. If Ramza has 10000 power or more, Ramza gains Haste and 'When Ramza attacks, choose 1 Forward of cost 3 or less opponent controls. Break it.'

card.Name: Dragoon
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP]: Dragoon gains First Strike until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Louisoix
card.Text: When Louisoix enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Alisaie)] or [Card Name (Alphinaud)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Andoria
card.Text: When a party you control deals damage to your opponent, draw 1 card.

card.Name: Vossler
card.Text: If you control [Card Name (Ashe)], the cost for playing Vossler onto the field is reduced by 2. If Vossler receives damage, reduce the damage by 1000 instead. If the [Card Name (Ashe)] you control receives damage, reduce the damage by 2000 instead.

card.Name: Aria (III)
card.Text: EX Burst: When Aria (III) enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Warrior of Light)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Ozma
card.Text: [0 CP]: Until the end of the turn, Ozma also becomes a Forward with 8000 power and 'Ozma doesn't receive damage from Dark cards.' You can only use this ability once per turn. Flare Star [S] [2 Water CP, 2 CP, dull]: All the Forwards opponent controls lose 2000 power for each CP required to play them until the end of the turn. You can only use this ability is Ozma is a Forward.

card.Name: Ondore
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Category (XII)] Forward you control. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Cloud of Darkness
card.Text: When Cloud of Darkness enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. It loses 2000 power for each Forward you control until the end of the turn. When Cloud of Darkness attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. It loses 1000 power for each Forward you control until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Curilla
card.Text: When Curilla enters the field or attacks, choose 1 Water Forward you control. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. Savage Blade [S] [1 Water CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage. If you control [Card Name (Trion)], deal it 9000 damage instead.

card.Name: Claidie
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Job (Prince)] Forward or [Job (Knight)] Forward. Activate it.

card.Name: Schrodinger
card.Text: When Schrodinger enters the field, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Forward, draw 1 card. If it is a Backup, select 1 Character in your Break Zone and add it to your hand. If it is a Monster, your opponent selects 1 Forward he/she controls and return it to its owner's hand. If it is a Summon, draw 2 cards.

card.Name: Tonberry
card.Text: When a Character opponent controls searches for 1 or more cards, put Tonberry into the Break Zone. If you do so, break that Character.

card.Name: Arcanist
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Water Forward. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn. [2 Water CP, 1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. It loses 3000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Baderon
card.Text: When Baderon enters the field, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 card among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.Name: Bismarck
card.Text: Select 1 of the following 3 actions: 'Choose 1 Monster. Return it to its owner's hand.' 'Choose 1 Character you control. Return it to its owner's hand.' 'Choose 1 Forward. Halve its power until the end of the turn (round down to the nearest 1000).'

card.Name: Celestia
card.Text: When a party you control attacks, all Forwards in that party gain +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Porom
card.Text: EX Burst: When Porom enters the field, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order. [1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 action ability. Cancel its effect.

card.Name: Flintlock
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. It doesn't receive damage that is less than its power this turn.

card.Name: Green Mage
card.Text: [Dull, put Green Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 action ability. Cancel its effect.

card.Name: Moogle Knight
card.Text: [1 Water CP]: Moogle Knight doesn't receive any damage from your opponent's Summons or abilities this turn.

card.Name: Leviathan
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward. If its cost is equal to or less than the number of cards in your hand, return it to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Fisher
card.Text: [2 Water CP, 1 CP, dull, put Fisher into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Monster of cost 3 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field. You can only use this ability during your turn.

card.Name: Refia
card.Text: The [Job (Warrior or Light)] Forwards and Water Forwards other than Refia you control gain +1000 power. [Dull a total of 5 active Water Forwards or Water Backups]: Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Return it to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Rosa
card.Text: EX Burst: When Rosa enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Cecil)] and add it to your hand. [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. During this turn, the next damage dealt to it is reduced by 1000 instead. If the Forward is [Card Name (Cecil)], during this turn, the next damage dealt to it is reduced by 3000 instead.

card.Name: Orator
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Select a Job. It gains that Job until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Orator
card.Text: [Dull, put Orator into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Monster you control. Return it to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Vaan
card.Text: When Vann attacks, select up to 2 of the following 5 actions. 'Draw 1 card.' 'Choose 1 Backup. Activate it.' 'Choose 1 Forward. Dull it.' 'Choose 1 Forward. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn.' 'Choose 1 Forward. It cannot block this turn.'

card.Name: Wol
card.Text: When Wol enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 [Job (Warrior of Light)] among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order. When Wol is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 [Job (Warrior or Light)] of cost 3 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field.

card.Name: Eald'narche
card.Text: If Eald'narche leaves the field, return Eald'narche to your hand instead. Paradise [S]: Take 1 more turn after this one. At the end of that turn, you lose the game.

card.Name: Kam'lanaut
card.Text: When Kam'lanaut enters the field, you may search for 1 Dark card and add it to your hand. Kam'lanaut cannot be chosen by Summons or abilities that share its Element. At the beginning of your Main Phase 1, select 1 Element. Kam'lanaut becomes that Element (this effect does not end at the end of the turn).

card.Name: Amodar
card.Text: If your opponent controls any Monster, Amodar gains +2000 power, First Strike and Brave. When a Forward you control is put from the field into the Break Zone, double the power of Amodar until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Noel
card.Text: If you control [Card Name (Serah)], Noel gains +2000 power. [2 Fire CP, 4 CP]: Play Noel onto the field. You can only use this ability during your Main Phase and if Noel is in the Break Zone.

card.Name: Lebreau
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Category (XIII)] Forward you control. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Serah

card.Name: Mog (XIII-2)
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Card Name (Serah)] or [Card Name (Noel)]. It gains First Strike or Brave until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Yeul
card.Text: [0 CP]: Look at the top card of your deck. You can only use this ability once per turn. When Yeul is put from the field into the Break Zone, put the top 10 cards of your deck into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Vaan

card.Name: Balthier

card.Name: Fran

card.Name: Yda

card.Name: Papalymo
card.Text: EX Burst: When Papalymo enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Yda)] and add it to your hand. If the [Card Name (Yda)] you control deals damage to a Forward, increase the damage by 2000 instead.

card.Text: EX Burst: When Minfilia enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Scion of the Seventh Dawn)] Forward and add it to your hand. [1 Earth CP, dull, put Minfilia into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it. You may only use this ability if you control 5 or more [Job (Scion of the Seventh Dawn)].

card.Name: Alisaie

card.Name: Alphinaud

card.Name: Urianger

card.Name: Ashe

card.Name: Rasler

card.Name: Ward

card.Text: If you control a [Job (Princess)], the [Job (Knight)] Forwards you control gain Brave. Blaze [S] (1 Fire CP): Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage. Round Edge [S] (2 Fire CP, 1 CP]: Choose 1 Forward. Break it. Deal 5000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Guy

card.Name: Kiros
card.Text: When Kiros enters the field, choose 1 Forward you control other than Kiros. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. If it is a [Category (VIII)] Forward, it also gains Haste, First Strike and Brave until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Illusionist
card.Text: [Dull, put Illusionist into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. It must attack this turn if possible.

card.Name: Cornelia

card.Name: Goblin

card.Name: Zell

card.Name: Warrior

card.Name: Soldier
card.Text: [2 CP]: Warrior gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Kazusa

card.Name: Bard

card.Text: EX BURST: When Kurasame enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Emina)] or [Card Name (Kazusa)] and add it to your hand. The Ice Forwards other than Kurasame you control gain +1000 power.

card.Name: Militesi Coeurl

card.Name: Summoner
card.Text: [1 CP, dull, put Summoner into the Break Zone]: Choose up to 2 Ice Summons in your Break Zone. Add them to your hand.

card.Name: Squall

card.Name: Snow

card.Name: Snow Giant
card.Text: [1 Ice CP, put Snow Giant into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Dull it and Freeze it.

card.Name: Celes
card.Text: [2 Ice CP]: Celes gains +3000 power until the end of the turn. You may only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Shock Trooper

card.Name: Hades

card.Name: Borghen

card.Name: Laguna

card.Name: Rinoa

card.Name: Locke

When Zidane attacks, your opponent reveals his/her hand. Select 1 Forward from their hand. Your opponent discards this card.

card.Name: Cid (II)
card.Text: [Dull]: Search for 1 Backup of cost 1 and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Cid Haze
card.Text: EX BURST: When Cid Haze enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Standard Unit)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: White Mage

card.Name: Shinra
card.Text: EX BURST: When Shinra enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Gullwings)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Zu
card.Text: [0 CP]: Until the end of the turn, Zu becomes a Forward with 7000 power and 'When Zu attacks, choose 1 Backup you control. Activate it.' You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Choco/Mog

card.Name: Diablos

card.Name: Paine
card.Text: The [Job (Gullwings)] Forwards you control cannot be chosen by your opponent's Summons. Assault [S]: All the [Job (Gullwings)] you control gain Haste until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Fujin

card.Name: Geomancer
card.Text: [Dull, put Geomancer into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 attacking Forward. Deal it 4000 damage.

card.Name: Paul
card.Text: Paul cannot be blocked by a Forward of cost 3 or more. When Paul deals damage to your opponent, your opponent puts the top 5 cards of his/her deck into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Maria
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Category (II)] Forward other than Maria. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. [Dull]: Deal 1000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls. [1 Wind CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. During this turn, the next damage dealt to it is reduced by 3000 instead.

card.Name: Moogle (XI)
card.Text: Retrieve [S] [Dull]: Search for 1 card and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Wingvern
card.Text: [1 Wind CP, 1 CP, put Wyvern into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward of power 9000 or more. Break it.

card.Name: Lezafold

Play 1 Wind character of cost 5 or less among them to the field and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order. [1 Wind CP, dull, put Lezafold into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. During this turn, the next damage it deals to a Forward becomes 0 instead.

card.Name: Ravager
card.Text: If you control a (Category [FFTA2]) Forward other than Raptor, Raptor gains +2000 power.

card.Name: Rikku
card.Text: The [Job (Gullwings)] Forwards you control cannot be chosen by your opponent's abilities. Escape [S]: Remove Rikku from the Battle. You can only use this ability when Rikku is in Battle.

card.Name: Ajido-Marujido
card.Text: When Ajido-Marujido enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions. 'Cast 1 Summon from your hand without paying the cost.' 'Choose up to 2 Summons in your Break Zone. Add them to your hand.'

card.Name: Dark Knight
card.Text: If Dark Knight receives damage, the damage is increased by 4000 instead.

card.Name: Warrior of Light
card.Text: When Warrior of Light enters the field, choose 1 [Job (Standard Unit]) of cost 2 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field. When a [Job (Standard Unit)] enters your field, Warrior of Light gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. Indomitable Charge [S] [2 Earth CP]: Until the end of the turn, all the Forwards you control gain +3000 power and Brave.

card.Name: Epitav
card.Text: When Epitav enters the field, you may search for 1 [Category (FFCC)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Scholar
card.Text: [2 Earth CP, dull, put Scholar into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Earth Summon in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Machinist
card.Text: [2 Earth CP, 1 CP, dull, put Machinist into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward of power 5000 or less. Break it.

card.Name: Gigas

card.Name: Krile (XIV)
card.Text: [1 Earth CP, 1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward you control. During this turn, it cannot be returned to its owner's hand by your opponent's Summons or abilities.

card.Name: Titan

card.Name: Pavlov
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Category (FFCC)] Forward. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Text: The [Job (Monk)] Forwards and [Card Name (Monk)] Forwards you control cannot become dull by your opponent's Summons or abilities. When Maat enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Monk)] or [Card Name (Monk)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Minfilia

[Dull, put Moogle Brothers into the Break Zone:] Play 1 [Job (Moogle)] of cost 2 or less from your hand onto the field.

card.Name: Monk
card.Text: [Dull, put Monk into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 7000 damage.

When Y'shtola attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If you control 5 or more [Job (Scion of the Seventh Dawn)] other than Y'shtola, deal it 8000 damage.

card.Name: Edea

card.Name: Estinien
card.Text: If you control 5 or more Backups, Estinien gains Haste. When Estinien is blocked, break the blocking Forward. [1 Lightning CP]: Activate Estinien. Estinien can attack once more this turn. You can only use this ability during your turn and only once per turn.

card.Name: Estinien
card.Text: You can only pay with CP produced by Lightning Backups to play Estinien from your hand onto the field. Haste First Strike

card.Name: Kain

card.Name: Seifer
card.Text: EX BURST: When Seifer enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Witch)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Diepvern

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: [1 Ice CP, dull]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 2000 damage.

You can only use this ability during your Main Phase.

Rapid Fire [S]: Until the end of the turn, Bartz gains Haste, Braze and 'Bartz can attack 3 times this turn.' You can only use this ability if Bartz used Spellblade and Dual-Wield this turn.

card.Name: Bartholomew

card.Name: Wind Drake

card.Name: Vanille

card.Name: Carbuncle

card.Name: Galuf
card.Text: Galuf cannot be broken during your turn. When Galuf attacks, choose 1 Forward. You may pay [2 Earth CP]. If you do so, it must block Galuf this turn if possible. Stop [S]: Choose up to 2 Forwards. They cannot attack this turn.

card.Text: The cost required to cast your Summons can be paid with CP of any Element. When you cast a Summon, choose 1 Forward. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn. [Discard 1 Summon]: Until the end of the turn, Krile cannot be chosen by your opponent's abilities.

card.Name: Shantotto

Noctis and the chosen Forward deal damage equal to their respective power to the other. [2 Earth CP, 2 CP]: During this turn, the next damage dealt to Noctis becomes 0 instead.

card.Name: Geomancer

card.Text: [Put Flan into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. If your opponent doesn't pay [1 CP], it cannot attack or block this turn. [Discard Flan]: Choose 1 blocking Forward. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn. You can only use this ability if Flan is in your hand.

card.Name: Moogle (FFCC)]
card.Text: The [Job (Moogle)] Backups you control can produce CP of any Element.

card.Name: Monk
card.Text: When Monk enters the field, choose 1 damaged Forward. If the cost to pay Monk included Lightning CP, deal it 5000 damage.

card.Name: Yojimbo
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward you control and 1 Forward opponent controls. The first gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. Then, each Forward deals damage equal to its power to the other. If Yojimbo results from an EX Burst, the former gains +3000 power until the end of the turn instead. Then, each Forward deals damage equal to its power to the other.

card.Name: Red Mage
card.Text: When Red Mage enters the field, choose 1 Forward of cost 3 or less opponent controls. If the cost paid to play Red Mage included Water CP, return it to its owner's hand. [2 Lightning CP, dull, put Red Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward of cost 4 or less. Break it.

card.Name: Argy
card.Text: When Argy is put from the field into the Break Zone, select 1 of the 3 following abilities: 'Choose 1 Forward. It gains Haste until the end of the turn.' 'Choose 1 Forward. Activate it.' 'Choose 1 Backup of cost 1 in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field.'

card.Name: Exdeath
card.Text: When Exdeath enters the field, choose 1 Forward from either player's Break Zone. If its cost is equal to or les than the number of Backups you control, play it onto your field.

card.Name: Gilgamesh
card.Text: For each [Card Name (Gilgamesh)] in your Break Zone, Gilgamesh gains +1000 power. If Gilgamesh has 10000 power or more, Gilgamesh gains Brave and can attack twice in the same turn. When Gilgamesh is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may pay [X CP]. If you do so, search for 1 [Card Name (Gilgamesh)] of cost X and play it onto the field dull.

card.Name: Coeurl
card.Text: [Put Coeurl into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains +3000 power, Haste, First Strike and Brave. [Discard Coeurl]: Choose 1 Monster of cost 1. Break it. You can only use this ability if Coeurl is in your hand.

card.Name: Gladiator
card.Text: When your opponent casts a Summon, Gladiator gains +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: The Emperor
card.Text: When The Emperor enters the field, choose 2 Forwards opponent controls. Dull them. During your turn, when a Forward opponent controls becomes dull, choose 1 active Forward opponent controls. Deal it 3000 damage.

card.Name: Thancred
card.Text: When Thancred enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Dull it. When Thancred enters the field, until the end of the turn, if the CP paid to play Thancred was only produced by [Category (XIV)] Backups, Thancred gains +2000 power, Haste and First Strike.

card.Name: Zapt
card.Text: Zapt is also a Monster in all situations. When Zapt is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Ramuh)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Seymour
card.Text: EX Burst: When Seymour enters the field, search for 1 Summon and put it on top of your deck. Lance of Atrophy [S] [2 Lightning CP]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Summon, you may cast it without paying the cost.

card.Name: Cid Previa
card.Text: When Cid Previa enters the field, choose 1 Lightning Backup of cost 3 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field. [1 Lightning CP, dull, put Cid Previa into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage.

card.Name: Noel
card.Text: Haste When Noel enters the field, until the end of the turn, Noel gains +3000 power and 'When Noel deals damage to your opponent, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it'.

card.Name: Barbara
card.Text: The [Job (Dragoon)] and [Card Name (Dragoon)] you control gain Haste. [1 CP]: Choose 1 [Job (Dragoon)] or [Card Name (Dragoon)] other than Barbara. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Flanborg
card.Text: When a Forward of cost 3 or less opponent controls is put from the field into the Break Zone, Flanborg becomes a Forward with 7000 power and 'If Flanborg is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may search for 1 [Job (Militarised Flan)] and add it to your hand'. (This effect does not end at the end of the turn. This ability will not trigger if Flanborg is a Forward.)

card.Name: Cannoneer
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP, dull, put Cannoneer and 1 Forward into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage.

card.Name: Mystic Knight
card.Text: [2 Lightning CP, dull, put Mystic Knight into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 damaged Forward. Break it.

card.Name: Mid Previa
card.Text: When Mid Previa enters the field, choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 3000 damage. When Mid Previa enters the field from the Break Zone, choose 1 active Forward. Deal it 6000 damage. [Discard 3 cards]: Play Mid Previa onto the field. You can only use this ability during your Main Phase and if Mid Previa is in the Break Zone.

card.Name: Lightning
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Category (XIII)] Forward you control. It gains Haste until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Ramuh
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward. It loses 7000 power until the end of the turn. If Ramuh results from an EX Burst, it loses 8000 power until the end of the turn instead.

card.Name: Ramza
card.Text: If Ramza has 4000 power or more, Ramza gains Haste. If Ramza has 6000 power or more, Ramza gains Brave. If Ramza has 8000 power or more, Ramza gains First Strike. [1 Lightning CP]: Ramza gains +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Dragoon
card.Text: When Dragoon enters the field, choose 1 Forward. If the cost paid to play Dragoon included Wind CP, it cannot be blocked this turn.

card.Name: Agrias
card.Text: If you control 7 or more Characters, Agrias gains +2000 power. When Agrias enters the field, turn over one card at a time from the top of your deck until a Character of cost 3 or less is revealed. Play it onto the field. Then, shuffle the other cards revealed and return them to the bottom of your deck.

card.Name: Gawain
card.Text: Gawain doesn’t receive any damage from Forwards' abilities.

card.Name: Kimahri
card.Text: The cost required to play Kimahri onto the field is reduced by 1 for each [Job (Guardian)] you control. The [Job (Guardian)] other than Kimahri you control cannot be chosen by your opponent's abilities. The [Category (X)] Characters other than Kimahri you control cannot be chosen by your opponent's Summons.

card.Name: Chemist
card.Text: [2 Water CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Activate it.

card.Name: Sahagin
card.Text: [Put Sahagin into the Break Zone]: Choose up to 2 Forwards you control. Activate them. They gain +1000 power until the end of the turn. [Discard Sahagin]: Choose 1 Forward of cost 1. Return it to its owner's hand. You can only use this ability if Sahagin is in your hand.

card.Name: Geosgaeno
card.Text: When a Forward opponent controls returns to its owner's hand from the field, Geosgaeno becomes a Forward with 7000 power and 'If Geosgaeno receives damage, the damage is reduced by 1000 instead'. (This effect does not end at the end of the turn. This ability will not trigger if Geosgaeno is a Forward.)

card.Name: White Mage
card.Text: When White Mage enters the field, choose up to 2 Forwards you control. Activate them.

card.Name: Styx
card.Text: When Styx enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If the cost to play Styx was only paid with Water CP, return it to its owner's hand. Undine Cry [S] [2 Water CP, dull]: Until the end of the turn, all the Forwards opponent controls lose 5000 power. You can only use this ability if you have received 5 points of damage or more.

card.Name: Sarah (FFL)
card.Text: When Sarah (FFL) enters the field, you may search for 1 [Job (Warrior of Light)] Forward of cost 4 or less other than Light or Dark and play it onto the field.

card.Name: Dusk
card.Text: When Dusk enters the field, if you control a [Job (Warrior of Light)] Forward other than Dusk, draw 1 card. [Dull]: During this turn, the cost required your next Summon is reduced by 1. (It cannot become 0.)

card.Name: Tidus
card.Text: Back Attack You can only pay with CP produced by Water Backups to play Tidus from your hand onto the field. When Tidus enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following abilities: 'Activate all Water Forwards.' 'Choose 1 Water Forward. It gains +3000 power until the end of the turn.'

card.Name: Tidus
card.Text: When Tidus enters the field, choose 1 Character you control. Return it to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Ninja
card.Text: When Ninja enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If the cost paid to play Ninja included Fire CP, it cannot block this turn. [1 Water CP, dull]: Return Ninja to your hand.

card.Name: Halicarnassus
card.Text: When Halicarnassus enters the field, all the Forwards opponent controls lose their abilities until the end of the turn. [Dull, discard 2 Summons]: Choose 1 Forward. Break it.

card.Name: Faris
card.Text: If you control a [Card Name (Lenna)] Forward, Faris gains +2000 power. When Faris enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 [Category (V)] Character among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.Name: Braska
card.Text: The cost required to play your [Job (Summoner)] onto the field is reduced by 1 (it cannot become 0).

card.Name: Mime
card.Text: When Mime enters the field, if the cost paid to play Mime included Earth CP, all the Forwards you control gain +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Yaag Rosch
card.Text: When Yaag Rosch enters the field, choose 1 Backup other than Yaag Rosch you control. Return it to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Oracle
card.Text: When Oracle enters the field, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Return these to the top and/or bottom of your deck in any order.

card.Name: Leviathan
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward of cost 4 or less. Return it to its owner's hand. If Leviathan results from an EX Burst: return it to its owner's hand and draw 1 card intead.

card.Name: Wakka
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Category (X)] Forward you control. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Yuna
card.Text: [0 CP]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Summon, you may pay the cost and cast it. You can only use this ability once per turn. [1 CP, remove 3 Summons in the Break Zone from the game]: Add Yuna to your hand. You can only use this ability during your Main Phase and if Yuna is in the Break Zone.

card.Name: Yuri
card.Text: Yuri has all the Elements except Dark. [Dull a total of three active Backups of the same Element or 2 Backups of the same Element and Yuri]: Choose 1 of the 4 following effects: 'Draw 1 card.' 'Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 4000 damage.' 'Choose 1 Forward. Dull it and Freeze it.' 'Choose 1 Forward. It loses all its abilities until the end of the turn.'

card.Name: Galdes
card.Text: When Galdes is put from the field into the Break Zone, select 1 of the 3 following abilities: 'Your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand.' 'Choose 1 Monster in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.' 'Choose 1 Forward. It loses 5000 power until the end of the turn.'

card.Name: Sin
card.Text: When Sin enters the field, break all the Forwards and Monsters other than Sin. Sin deals you 1 point of damage. Giga-Graviton [S] [9 CP]: At the end of your next turn, if Sin is on the field, your opponent loses the game. You can only use this ability during your turn.

card.Name: Warrior of Light
card.Text: If you control 4 or more Forwards, Warrior of Light gains Haste. When Warrior of Light enters the field, all the Forwards you control gain +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Firion
card.Text: EX Burst: When Firion enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 2000 damage for each Forward you control (up to 3 Forwards).

card.Name: Ultimecia
card.Text: When Ultimecia enters the field, select 1 of the 3 following abilities: 'Choose up to 2 Characters opponent controls. Dull them.' 'Freeze all the Forwards opponent controls.' 'Freeze all the Backups opponent controls.'

card.Name: The Emperor
card.Text: EX Burst: When The Emperor enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If you have received 4 points of damage or more, dull it and Freeze it. [1 Ice CP, dull, discard 2 cards]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Break it. You can only use this ability during your turn.

card.Name: Cecil
card.Text: EX Burst: When Cecil enters the field, choose up to 2 Characters. Activate them. If you have received 5 points of damage or more, Cecil gains +2000 power and 'Cecil cannot be chosen by your opponent's abilities.'

card.Name: Y'shtola
card.Text: When Y'shtola enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 2000 damage. [1 Wind CP, dull, put Y'shtola into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage. You can only use this ability if you control 7 or more Characters.

card.Name: Garland
card.Text: When Garland blocks, Garland gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. When Garland is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Forward. It gains +4000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Golbez
card.Text: The cost required to play Golbez onto the field is reduced by 1 for ever 5 cards in your Break Zone. When Golbez enters the field, choose 1 Forward of cost 5 or less in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Ark Angel HM
card.Text: If Ark Angel HM deals damage to your opponent, double the damage instead. When Ark Angel HM attacks, Ark Angel HM gains +3000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Red Mage
card.Text: When Red Mage enters the field, choose 1 Fire Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains Haste and Brave.

card.Name: Ifrit
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 4000 damage and 1000 more damage for each Fire Backup you control.

card.Name: Iroha
card.Text: If a Fire Character you control deals damage to a Forward, increase the damage by 1000 instead. [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 1000 damage.

card.Name: Edgar
card.Text: [Dull]: Choose 1 [Category (VI)] Forward you control. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Cloud
card.Text: EX Burst: When Cloud enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 3000 damage and 1000 more damage for each point of damage you have received. When Cloud is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may remove the top 10 cards of your deck from the game. If you do so, return Cloud to the field dull.

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: [2 Fire CP, dull, put Black Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Fire Summon in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Golem
card.Text: When Golem enters the field, choose 1 Forward. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. [Put Golem into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 attacking Forward. It gains +4000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Samurai
card.Text: If you have received 3 points of damage or more, Samurai gains Brave. If you have received 5 points of damage or more, Samurai gains +1000 power.

card.Name: Amarant
card.Text: EX Burst: When Amarant enters the field, select 1 of the following 2 abilities: 'Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 7000 damage.' 'Choose 1 Monster of cost 3 or less opponent controls. Break it.'

card.Name: Cid (FFL)
card.Text: When Cid (FFL) enters the field, choose 1 Forward. Deal it 5000 damage. If you control 5 or more Fire Backups, deal it 8000 damage instead.

card.Name: Zenos
card.Text: If your opponent controls any [Job (Warrior of Light)] Forwards, Zenos gains +2000 power, Haste and Brave. When Zenos deals damage to your opponent, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 5000 damage.

card.Name: Warrior
card.Text: [1 Fire CP]: If Warrior deals damage to a Forward this turn, the damage increases by 2000 instead.

card.Name: Duncan
card.Text: You may use Duncan's special ability by discarding a [Card Name (Sabin)] instead of discarding a [Card Name (Duncan)] as part of the cost. When Duncan enters the field, choose 1 Forward of cost 4 or less. Deal it 4000 damage. Phantom Rush [S] [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it damage equal to Duncan's power.

card.Name: Bahamut
card.Text: You can only pay with CP produced by Backups to cast Bahamut. Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 10000 damage. If it is put from the field into the Break Zone this turn, remove it from the game instead.

card.Name: Vivi
card.Text: When Vivi enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 2000 damage. If you control 4 or more [Category (IX)] Characters, deal it 7000 damage instead. If you control 7 or more [Category (IX)] Characters, deal it 10000 damage instead.

card.Name: Brynhildr
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage.

card.Name: Marche
card.Text: EX Burst: When Marche enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 Fire Character among those to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.Name: Sabin
card.Text: When Sabin attacks, choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage. If you control [Card Name (Edgar)], deal it 4000 damage instead.

card.Name: Yotsuyu
card.Text: [1 Fire CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward of cost 5 or less. It cannot block this turn.

card.Name: Rain
card.Text: When Rain enters the field or attacks, choose 1 Forward. You may pay 1 Fire CP. If you do so, deal it 3000 damage.

card.Name: Lava Spider
card.Text: The attacking Forwards you control gain +3000 power.

card.Name: Ark Angel GK
card.Text: EX Burst: When Ark Angel GK enters the field, freeze all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Umaro
card.Text: Umaro must attack once per turn if possible. When Umaro attacks, if you don't pay 1 Ice CP, discard 1 card from your hand.

card.Name: Imperio
card.Text: When Imperio enters the field, you may pay 1 Ice CP. If you do so, search for 1 Light Forward and add it to your hand. When Imperio is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may search for 1 Dark Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Garland (IX)
card.Text: At the beginning of your opponent's Main Phase 1, your opponent selects 1 active Character he/she controls and dulls it. At the beginning of your Main Phase 1, choose 1 Character. You may pay 1 Ice CP. If you do so, freeze it.

card.Name: Scholar
card.Text: [Dull, put Scholar into the Break Zone]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Ice card, add it to your hand.

card.Name: The Mask
card.Text: When The Mask enters the field, you may search for 1 [Category (FFL)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Bard
card.Text: [Dull, put Bard into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Freeze it.

card.Name: Black Mage
card.Text: [2 Ice CP, 3 CP, dull, put Black Mage into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 9000 damage.

card.Name: Cocytus
card.Text: EX Burst: When Cocytus enters the field, choose up to 2 Forwards. If you control 4 or more Ice Characters, freeze them. When Cocytus enters the field, choose 1 Forward. Dull it.

card.Name: Shiva
card.Text: You can only cast Shiva during your turn. Choose up to 3 Forwards or Monsters opponent controls. Dull them and Freeze them.

card.Name: Shiva
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 dull Forward. Deal it 5000 damage and 1000 more damage for each Ice Backup you control.

card.Name: Scale Toad
card.Text: At the end of your opponent's turn, if your opponent has 2 cards or more in his/her hand, your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand.

card.Name: Squall
card.Text: When Squall enters the field, if your opponent controls any dull Forwards, your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand. [2 Ice CP, 1 CP]: Choose 1 Forward. Dull it. You can only use this ability if you have no cards in your hand.

card.Name: Setzer
card.Text: When Setzer enters the field, choose 1 [Category (VI)] Forward in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Celes
card.Text: When Celes attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If you control 3 or more [Category (VI)] Characters, dull it. When Celes deals damage to your opponent, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Freeze it.

card.Name: Sophia
card.Text: [Dull, put Sophia into the Break Zone]: Dull all the Forwards with Haste, First Strike or Brave opponent controls.

card.Name: Time Mage
card.Text: When Time Mage enters the field, you may discard 1 card from your hand. If you do so, dull and freeze all the Forwards of the same cost as the discarded card opponent controls.

card.Name: Mateus, the Corrupt
card.Text: EX Burst: Your opponent puts 1 attacking Forward he/she controls into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Palom
card.Text: When Palom enters the field, select 1 of the 3 following actions. 'Each player discards 1 card from his/her hand.' 'Choose 1 Forward. Freeze it.' 'Dull all the Backups opponent controls.'

card.Name: Dark Fina
card.Text: When Dark Fina enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions. If you have received 5 points of damage or more, select up to 2 of the 2 following actions instead. 'Search for 1 Summon and add it to your hand.' 'Cast 1 Summon of cost 7 or less from your hand without paying the cost.'

card.Name: Lasswell
card.Text: When Lasswell enters the field or attacks, choose 1 Forward. If it has received damage this turn, dull it and freeze it. [1 Fire CP]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 1000 damage. Azure Sky [S] [1 Fire CP, 1 Ice CP, dull]: Choose 2 Forwards. Deal 8000 damage to the first Forward and dull and freeze the other.

card.Name: Lancer Unit
card.Text: When Lancer Unit enters the field, choose 1 Forward. Dull it and freeze it. [Put Lancer Unit into the Break Zone]: Your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand. You can only use this ability during your turn.

card.Name: Ark Angel MR
card.Text: Ark Angel MR cannot be blocked by a Forward of power 7000 or more. [2 Wind CP]: Ark Angel MR cannot be chosen by your opponent's Summons or abilities this turn.

card.Name: Alexander
card.Text: Choose 1 Character of cost 4 or more. Break it.

card.Name: Waltrill
card.Text: When Waltrill enters the field, place up to 2 cards from your hand at the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, draw the same number of cards as were returned to your deck. [Dull, put Waltrill into the Break Zone]: Draw 1 card, then place 1 card from your hand at the bottom of your deck. You can only use this ability if you control [Card Name (Norschtalen)].

card.Name: Warrior of Light
card.Text: When a [Job (Standard Unit)] Forward enters your field, choose up to 2 Backups. Activate them. When Warrior of Light attacks, all the [Job (Standard Unit)] Forwards you control gain +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Aerith
card.Text: The Forwards you control don't receive damage that is less than their power. If Aerith is dealt damage by a Summon or an ability, reduce the damage by 2000 instead. When Aerith is put from the field into the Break Zone, activate all the Backups you control.

card.Name: Onion Knight
card.Text: EX Burst: When Onion Knight enters the field, choose up to 2 Backups you control. If you have received 3 points of damage or more, activate them. If you have received 5 points of damage or more, activate all the Backups you control instead.

card.Name: Garuda
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage and 1000 more damage for each Wind Character you control.

card.Name: Thief
card.Text: When Thief enters the field, name 1 Element. Your opponent randomly reveals 2 cards from his/her hand. Select 1 card of the same Element as named among them. Your opponent discards this card.

card.Name: Sherlotta
card.Text: If you pay a CP, you may put Sherlotta into the Break Zone to produce 1 CP of any Element. (You can dull Sherlotta to pay the CP.)

card.Name: Cid Highwind
card.Text: When Cid Highwind enters the field, choose 1 Backup of cost 3 or more opponent controls. Return it to its owner's hand. Big Brawl [S] [Dull]: Choose 1 Character opponent controls. Return it to its opponent's hand.

card.Name: Selkie
card.Text: When Selkie is put from the field into the Break Zone, your opponent puts the top 2 cards of his/her deck into the Break Zone. If both cards are of the same type, draw 1 card.

card.Name: Deathgaze (IX)
card.Text: When Deathgaze (IX) enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Remove it from the game for as long as Deathgaze (IX) is on the field.

card.Name: Ninja
card.Text: [2 Wind CP, dull, put Ninja into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Backup of cost 3 or less. Break it.

card.Name: Norschtalen
card.Text: When Norschtalen enters the field, you may search for 1 [Category (FFCC)] Backup and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Basilisk
card.Text: When Basilisk enters the field, choose 1 Forward. Deal it 4000 damage. [Put Basilisk into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 damaged Forward. Break it.

card.Name: Fina
card.Text: If you pay the cost to pay Fina onto the field, you may pay an extra 3 Wind CP. When Fina enters the field, select 1 of the following 2 actions. If you paid the extra cost, select 2 of the 2 following actions instead. 'Deal 5000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.' 'Activate all the Characters you control.'

card.Name: Fina
card.Text: When Fina enters the field, choose 1 Wind Character you control. Activate it. When Fina is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Character you control. Activate it.

card.Name: Veriaulde
card.Text: When Veriaulde is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Wind Monster of cost 4 or less in your Break Zone. Play it onto the field.

card.Name: Matoya
card.Text: EX Burst: When Matoya enters the field, choose 1 Monster opponent controls. Break it.

card.Name: Yuffie
card.Text: If you control 3 or more [Category (VII)] Characters other than Yuffie, Yuffie gains +2000 power and Haste. When Yuffie attacks, deal 1000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Archer
card.Text: [2 Wind CP, dull, put Archer into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 10000 damage.

card.Name: Chaos, Walker of the Wheel
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it. If that Forward is put into the Break Zone, your opponent may play 1 Forward from their hand onto the field.

card.Name: Ark Angel TT
card.Text: When Ark Angel TT enters the field, choose 1 dull Forward opponent controls. At the end of your opponent's next turn, break it.

card.Name: Ardyn
card.Text: Brave Ardyn cannot be broken. At the beginning of your opponent's Attack Phase, your opponent selects 1 Character he/she controls. He/she may put it into the Break Zone. If he/she does, Ardyn cannot block this turn.

card.Name: Apururu
card.Text: The cost required to play Apururu onto the field is reduced by 1 for each Backup you control. When Apururu enters the field, choose 1 Character in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Dark Knight
card.Text: [1 Earth CP, 1 CP, dull, put Dark Knight into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains +1000 power for each point of damage you have received.

card.Name: Undead Princess
card.Text: When Undead Princess enters the field, choose 1 Forward. If your opponent doesn't pay 3 CP, it cannot attack or block this turn. [Put 2 Earth Backups into the Break Zone]: Play Undead Princess onto the field dull. You can only use this ability if Undead Princess is in the Break Zone.

card.Name: Ignis
card.Text: EX Burst: When Ignis enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Noctis)] and add it to your hand. The [Category (XV)] Forwards other than Ignis you control gain +1000 power and Brave. Overwhelm [S] [1 Earth CP]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 4000 damage for each [Category (XV)] Forward you control.

card.Name: Machinist
card.Text: When Machinist enters the field, choose 1 dull Forward. Break it.

card.Name: Gladiolus
card.Text: You can only pay with Earth CP to play Gladiolus onto the field. If you control [Card Name (Noctis)], the cost for playing Gladiolus onto the field is reduced by 2. Cyclone [S] [2 Earth CP, 2 CP, dull]: Deal 7000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Graham
card.Text: When Graham is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If you have received 4 points of damage or more, break it.

card.Name: Glaive
card.Text: EX Burst: When Glaive enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Sol)] or [Card Name (Diana)] and add it to your hand. The [Category (FFL)] Forwards other than Glaive you control gain +2000 power.

card.Name: Titan
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains +1000 power for each Earth Backup you control.

card.Name: Nacht
card.Text: If you control a [Job (Warrior of Darkness)] other than Nacht, Nacht gains +1000 power and Brave. [X CP, X CP]: Choose 1 Forward or Monster. If the cost is X, break it. You can only use this ability during your turn and only once per turn. Ebony Slash [S] [2 Earth CP]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 8000 damage.

card.Text: Choose 1 Backup of cost 3 or more. Break it.

card.Name: Marlene

card.Name: Moogle Knight
card.Text: Brave If Moogle Knight is dealt damage by a Forward, reduce the damage by 3000 instead. If a Forward forming a party with Moogle Knight receives damage, reduce the damage by 3000 instead.

card.Text: If you control 5 or more Earth Characters, Garif gains +2000 power.

card.Name: Golem
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. Draw 1 card.

card.Name: Cor
card.Text: If you control [Card Name (Regis)], Cor gains +2000 power. When Cor or a [Category (XV)] Forward enters your field, until the end of the turn, Cor gains +1000 power and Brave.

card.Name: Cid Garlond
card.Text: When Cid Garlond enters the field, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 Earth Character among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order. [1 Earth CP, dull, put Cid Garlond into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Category XIV Character in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Mist Dragon
card.Text: Select 1 of the 3 following actions. 'Choose 1 Summon of cost 5 or less. Cancel its effect.' 'Choose 1 Forward you control. Dull it. It doesn’t receive any damage this turn.' 'Remove all the cards in your opponent's Break Zone from the game. Draw 1 card.'

card.Name: Tonberry
card.Text: During your turn, Tonberry also becomes a Forward with 4000 power. When Tonberry is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 1000 damage for every 2 Forwards in your Break Zone.

card.Name: Ba'Gamnan
card.Text: The [Job (Headhunter)] Forwards other than Ba'Gamnan you control gain +1000 power. When Ba'Gamnan enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Gijuk)], [Card Name (Bwagi)], or [Card Name (Rinok)] and play it onto the field.

card.Name: Bangaa
card.Text: When Bangaa enters the field, you may pay 1 Earth CP. When you do so, choose 1 Earth Character in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Baigan
card.Text: If Baigan is dealt 3000 damage or less, the damage becomes 0 instead. When Baigan is dealt 4000 damage or more, you may put Baigan into the Break Zone. When you do so, deal 7000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Class Fifth Moogle
card.Text: [1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Earth Forward you control. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Class Tenth Moogle
card.Text: If Class Tenth Moogle is on the field, Class Tenth Moogle can produce Lightning CP.

card.Name: Yang
card.Text: When Yang enters the field, choose 1 Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains +2000 power and Brave. If it is a [Job (Monk)] or a [Card Name (Monk)], until the end of the turn, it also gains 'When this Forward attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it damage equal to this Forward's power.'

card.Name: Larkeicus
card.Text: When Larkeicus enters the field, choose 1 Monster in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand. [2 Earth CP, dull]: Search for 1 Monster and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Rydia
card.Text: When Rydia enters the field, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal 1 Summon other than Light and Dark among them and cast it without paying the cost. Then, shuffle the other cards and return them to the bottom of your deck. [X CP, dull]: Look at the top X cards of your deck. Reveal 1 Summon of cost X or less among them and cast it without paying the cost. Then, shuffle the other cards and return them to the bottom of your deck.

card.Name: Rinok
card.Text: [1 Earth CP]: Choose 1 [Job (Headhunter)]. During this turn, the next damage it deals to a Forward becomes double the damage instead. You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: Lilty
card.Text: When Lilty blocks, choose 1 Forward in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Regis
card.Text: When Regis enters the field, you may search for 1 [Category (XV)] Forward and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Azul
card.Text: If Azul is dealt damage by a Forward, reduce the damage by 5000 instead.

card.Name: Edea
card.Text: EX Burst: When Edea enters the field, choose 1 active Forward opponent controls. Deal it 1000 damage for each Lightning Character you control.

card.Name: Odin
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward of cost 2 or less. Break it. Draw 1 card.

card.Name: Kain
card.Text: Before paying the cost to play Kain onto the field, you may put 1 active Lightning Backup you control into the Break Zone. If you do so, the cost for playing Kain onto the field is reduced by 5. When Kain enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. It loses 8000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Cid of Clan Gully
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP, dull, discard 1 [Category (FFTA2)] Forward, put Cid of Clan Gully into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 active Forward. Break it.

card.Name: Goblin
card.Text: During your turn, Goblin also becomes a Forward with 5000 power. When Goblin deals damage to your opponent, you may put Goblin into the Break Zone. When you do so, draw 2 cards.

card.Name: Golbez
card.Text: [1 Lightning CP, dull]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Forward, play it onto the field. You can only use this ability during your turn. Double Meteor [S] [2 Lightning CP]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 9000 damage. You may discard 1 [Card Name (Golbez)]. If you do so, use this special ability again without paying the cost.

card.Name: Seizer
card.Text: If you control a [Job (Witch)], Seifer gains +3000 power.

card.Name: Seeq
card.Text: When Seeq enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it.

card.Name: Sage
card.Text: When Sage enters the field, you may pay 1 Lightning CP. When you do so, choose 1 Summon in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Nero (XIV)
card.Text: When Nero (XIV) enters the field, if you control a Forward of any Element other than Lightning, until the end of the turn, Nero (XIV) gains +2000 power, Haste and Brave. When Nero (XIV) is added to your hand from the Break Zone, choose 1 Forward. Deal it 2000 damage.

card.Name: Baknamy
card.Text: When a Lightning Forward other than Baknamy enters your field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Dull it.

card.Name: Bahamut ZERO
card.Text: Choose 1 active Forward opponent controls. Break it. Dull all the Forwards opponent controls.

card.Name: Fusoya
card.Text: The cost required to cast your Summons can be paid with CP of any Element. When Fusoya enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Deal it 1000 damage for each CP required to play the revealed cards. Add all the revealed cards to your hand.

card.Name: Meia
card.Text: At the beginning of your Attack Phase, select 1 of the 3 following actions. If you have received 5 points of damage or more, select up to 2 of the 3 following actions instead. 'Choose 1 Forward. Until the end of the turn, it gains +1000 power and First Strike.' 'Choose 1 Forward. Dull it.' 'Choose 1 [Category (MOBIUS)] Forward other than Meia. It gains Haste until the end of the turn. '

card.Name: Class Third Moogle
card.Text: [1 CP, dull]: Choose 1 Lightning Forward you control. It gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Class Sixth Moogle
card.Text: If Class Sixth Moogle is on the field, Class Sixth Moogle can produce Water CP.

card.Name: Reeve
card.Text: EX Burst: When Reeve enters the field, you may search for 1 [Card Name (Vincent)] or [Card Name (Cait Sith)] and add it to your hand.

card.Name: Livia
card.Text: When Livia enters the field, if the cost to play Livia didn't include CP of 3 or more different Elements, put Livia into the Break Zone. [1 CP]: Livia gains Brave until the end of the turn. [3 CP]: Break the Forward that blocks Livia.

card.Name: Ravus
card.Text: EX Burst: When Ravus enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Dull it. When Ravus enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If the number of Forwards your opponent controls is greater than the number of Forwards you control, dull it.

card.Name: Adel (VIII)
card.Text: If you don't control a Forward other than Adel (VIII), Adel (VIII) gains +1000 power and 'When Adel (VIII) attacks, you may discard 1 card. When you do so, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Return it to its owner's hand.'

card.Name: Ultimecia
card.Text: When Ultimecia enters the field, each player reveals the top card of his/her deck. Each player who revealed a Character may play it onto the field. [2 Water CP, 2 CP, put Ultimecia into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Forward. Put it on top of its owner's deck.

card.Name: Iedolas
card.Text: [Dull, put Iedolas into the Break Zone]: Choose 1 Summon of cost 4 or less in your Break Zone. Cast it without paying the cost. Remove that Summon from the game after use instead of putting it in the Break Zone.

card.Name: Ultros
card.Text: When Ultros attacks, deal 2000 damage and 1000 more damage for each [Card Name (Ultros)] in your Break Zone to all the Forwards opponent controls. When Ultros is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may pay 2 Water CP. When you do so, search for 1 [Card Name (Ultros)] and play it onto the field dull.

card.Name: Gau
card.Text: If you control a Monster, Gau gains +2000 power. If you control 3 or more Monsters, Gau gains Brave.

card.Name: Ghis
card.Text: When Ghis enters the field, all the Forwards opponent controls lose 1000 power until the end of the turn. When Ghis is dealt damage, you may remove Ghis from the game. If you do so, return Ghis onto the field dull, then remove the top 3 cards of your deck from the game.

card.Name: Gogo
card.Text: [0 CP]: Choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Gogo gains his/her action abilities until the end of the turn. You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: White Mage
card.Text: When White Mage enters the field, you may pay 1 Water CP. When you do so, draw 1 card.

card.Name: Cecil
card.Text: If you control 2 or more [Category (IV)] Forwards other than Cecil, Cecil gains +2000 power and Brave. [0 CP]: Choose 1 Forward you control other than Cecil. During this turn, the next time this Forward would take damage, reduce it by 4000 instead and deal Cecil 4000 damage. You can only use this ability once per turn.

card.Name: King of Concordia
card.Text: [1 Water CP, dull, put King of Concordia into the Break Zone: Choose 1 Forward you control. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. At the end of the turn, return it to its owner's hand.

card.Name: Banon
card.Text: When Banon is chosen by your opponent's Summons or abilities, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Backup, cancel all effects choosing Banon. [Dull]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Forward, add it to your hand.

card.Name: Paladin
card.Text: When Paladin enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions. 'Choose 1 [Job (Standard Unit)] in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.' 'Until the end of the turn, all the Forwards you control gain +1000 power and Brave.'

card.Name: Famfrit
card.Text: Each player selects up to 2 Forwards or Monsters he/she controls (select as many as possible). Put them into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Cúchulainn, the Impure
card.Text: EX Burst: Choose 1 Forward. It loses all abilities until the end of the turn. Draw 1 card.

card.Name: Porom
card.Text: EX Burst: When Porom is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Summon in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.

card.Name: Moogle (XII)
card.Text: When Moogle (XII) attacks or blocks, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Return these to the top and/or bottom of your deck in any order.

card.Name: Mog (VI)
card.Text: When Mog (VI) enters the field, draw 2 cards. When Mog (VI) leaves the field, discard 2 cards from your hand. Dusk Requiem [S] [2 Water CP, dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card's CP cost is an even number, return chosen Forward to its owner's hand. Add the revealed card to your hand. If the revealed card's CP cost is an odd number, deal the chosen Forward 4000 damage, dull it and Freeze it. Add the revealed card to your hand.

card.Name: Malboro
card.Text: During your turn, Malboro also becomes a Forward with 6000 power. When Malboro is blocked, all the Forwards opponent controls lose 2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Larsa
card.Text: [Dull]: Negate all damage dealt to all the Forwards you control.

card.Name: Rosa
card.Text: If a Forward you control is dealt damage, reduce the damage by 1000 instead. When Rosa forms a party and attacks, activate Rosa. Rosa can attack once more this turn. Pray [S]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Water card, activate all the Forwards you control.

card.Name: Wol
card.Text: You can only pay with Fire CP, Wind CP, Earth CP or Water CP and you must use CP of 2 or more different Elements to play Wol onto the field. When Wol is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 9000 damage.

card.Name: Locke
card.Text: At the beginning of your Main Phase 1, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Add 1 [Category (VI)] Character among them to your hand and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order. When Locke attacks, all the [Category (VI)] Forwards other than Locke you control gain +2000 power until the end of the turn.

card.Name: Chaos (MOBIUS)
card.Text: When Chaos (MOBIUS) enters the field, if the cost paid to play Chaos (MOBIUS) included Fire CP, deal 5000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls. If the cost paid to play Chaos (MOBIUS) included Ice CP, your opponent discards 1 card from his/her hand. If the cost paid to play Chaos (MOBIUS) included Lightning CP, your opponent selects 1 Monster he/she controls. Put it into the Break Zone.

card.Name: Emperor Gestahl
card.Text: When Emperor Gestahl enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it. [Dull, put Emperor Gestahl into the Break Zone]: Play 1 Dark Forward of cost 5 or less from your hand onto the field. You can only use this ability during your turn.
